GSP33ramvaspu:2: paraṃ brahmaivājñaṃ bhramaparigataṃ saṃsarati tatparopādhyālīḍhaṃ vivaśamaśubhasyāspadam iti
GSP33ramvaspu:3: śrutinyāyāpetaṃ jagati vitataṃ mohanam idaṃ tamo yenāpāstaṃ sa hi vijayate yāmunamuniḥ //(2)
GSP33ramvaspu:6: dehātiriktātmasvarūpatatsvabhāvatadantarayāmiparamātmasvarūpatatsvabhāvatadupāsanatatphalabhūtātmasvarūpāvirbhāvapūrvakānavadhikātiśayānandabrahmānubhavajñāpane pravṛttaṃ hi vedāntavākyajātam, tat tvam asi /
GSP33ramvaspu:8: ya ātmani tiṣṭhann ātmano 'ntaro yam ātmā na veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ ya ātmānam antaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:9: eṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmāpahatapāpmā divyo deva eko nārāyaṇaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:10: tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasānāśakena /
GSP33ramvaspu:12: tam evaṃ vidvān amṛta iha bhavati nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyata ityādikam /
GSP33ramvaspu:15: svarūpabhedo vācām agocaraḥ svasaṃvedyaḥ, jñānasvarūpam ity etāvad eva nirdeśyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:20: sarvātmaparabrahmaparajyotiḥparatattvaparamātmasadādiśabdabhedair nikhilavedāntavedyo bhagavān nārāyaṇaḥ puruṣottama ity antaryāmisvarūpam /
GSP33ramvaspu:21: asya ca vaibhavapratipādanaparāḥ śrutayaḥ svetarasamastacidacidvastujātāntarātmatayā nikhilaniyamanaṃ tacchaktitadaṃśatadvibhūtitadrūpataccharīratattanuprabhṛtibhiḥ śabdais tatsāmānādhikaraṇyena ca pratipādayanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:22: tasya vaibhavapratipādanaparāṇām eṣāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyādīnāṃ vivaraṇe pravṛttāḥ kecana nirviśeṣajñānamātram eva brahma, tac ca nityamuktasvaprakāśasvabhāvam api tat tvam asy ādisāmānādhikaraṇyāvagatajīvāikyaṃ, brahmaivājñaṃ badhyate mucyate ca,
GSP33ramvaspu:23: nirviśeṣacinmātrātirekeśvareśitavyādyanantavikalparūpaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jaganmithyā, kaścid baddhaḥ, kaścin mukta ity iyam avasthā na vidyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:24: itaḥ pūrvaṃ kecana muktā ity ayam artho mithyā /
GSP33ramvaspu:26: nirjīvānītarāṇi, taccharīraṃ kim iti na vyavasthitam, ācāryo jñānasyopadeṣṭā mithyā śāstraṃ ca mithyā śāstrapramātā ca mithyā
GSP33ramvaspu:27: śāstrajanyaṃ jñānaṃ ca mithyā etat sarvaṃ mithyābhūtenaiva śāstreṇāvagamyata iti varṇayanti
GSP33ramvaspu:28: apare tv apahatapāpmatvādisamastakalyāṇaguṇopetam api brahmaitenaivāikyāvabodhena kenacid upādhiviśeṣeṇa saṃbaddhaṃ badhyate mucyate ca nānāvidhamalarūpapariṇāmāspadaṃ ceti vyavasthitāḥ anye punar aikyāvabodhayāthātmyaṃ varṇayantaḥ svābhāvikaniratiśayāparimitodāraguṇasāgaraṃ brahmaiva suranaratiryaksthāvaranārakisvargyapavargicetaneṣu svabhāvato vilakṣaṇam avilakṣaṇaṃ ca viyadādinānāvidhamalarūpapariṇāmāspadaṃ ceti pratyavatiṣṭhante /
GSP33ramvaspu:29: tatra prathamapakṣasya śrutyarthaparyālocanaparā duṣparihārān doṣān udāharanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:31: tad+aikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyetyārabhya sanmūlāḥ somyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sadāyatanāḥ satpratiṣṭhā ityādibhiḥ padaiḥ pratipāditās tatsaṃbandhitayā prakaraṇāntaranirdiṣṭāḥ sarvajñatāsarvaśaktitvasarveśvaratvasarvaprakāratvasamābhyadhikanivṛttisatyakāmatvasatyasaṃkalpatvasarvāvabhāsakatvādyanavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇā apahatapāpmetyādyanekavākyāvagatanirastanikhiladoṣatā ca sarve tasmin pakṣe vihanyante atha syāt upakrame 'py ekavijñānena sarvavijñānamukhena kāraṇasyaiva
GSP33ramvaspu:32: satyatāṃ pratijñāya tasya kāraṇabhūtasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ satyatāṃ vikārajātasyāsatyatāṃ mṛddṛṣṭāntena darśayitvā satyabhūtasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam iti sajātīyavijātīyanikhilabhedanirasanena nirviśeṣataiva pratipāditā /
GSP33ramvaspu:33: etac chodhakāni prakaraṇāntaragatavākyāny api satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahma,
GSP33ramvaspu:34: niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ nirguṇaṃ, vijñānam ānandam ityādīni
GSP33ramvaspu:37: ekatve 'pi vastunaḥ sarvaviśeṣapratyanīkatopasthāpanena sarvapadānām arthavattvād iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:39: ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ sarvasya mithyātve sarvasya jñātavyasyābhāvān na setsyati /
GSP33ramvaspu:41: api tv ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ sarvasya tadātmakatvenaiva satyatve sidhyati /
GSP33ramvaspu:42: ayam arthaḥ śvetaketuṃ pratyāha stabdho 'sy uta tam ādeśam aprākṣya iti paripūrṇa iva lakṣyase tān ācāryān prati tam apy ādeśaṃ pṛṣṭavān asīti /
GSP33ramvaspu:45: etasya vā akṣarasya gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhata ity ādibhir aikyarthyāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:46: tathā ca mānavaṃ vacaḥ praśāsitāraṃ sarveṣām ityādi /
GSP33ramvaspu:47: atrāpy ekam eveti jagadupādānatāṃ pratipādyādvitīyapadenādhiṣṭhātaranivāraṇād asyaivādhiṣṭhātṛtvam api pratipādyate /atas taṃ praśāsitāraṃ jagadupādānabhūtam api pṛṣṭavān asi yena śrutena matena vijñātenāśrutam amatam avijñānaṃ śrutaṃ mataṃ vijñātaṃ bhavatīty uktaṃ syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:48: nikhilajagadudayavibhavavilayādikāraṇabhūtaṃ sarvajñatvasatyakāmatvasatyasaṃkalpatvaparimitodāraguṇagaṇasāgaraṃ kiṃ brahmāpi tvayā śrutam iti hārdo bhāvaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:49: tasya nikhilakāraṇatayā kāraṇam eva nānāsaṃsthānaviśeṣasaṃsthitaṃ kāryam ity ucyata iti kāraṇabhūtasūkṣmacidacidvastuśarīrakabrahmavijñānena kārrabhūtam akhilaṃ jagad vijñātaṃ bhavatīti hṛdi nidhāya yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavaty amataṃ matam avijñātaṃ vijñātaṃ syād iti putraṃ prati pṛṣṭavān pitā /
GSP33ramvaspu:50: tad etatsakalasya vastujātasyaikakāraṇatvaṃ pitṛhṛdi nihitam ajānan putraḥ parasparavilakṣaṇeṣu vastuṣv anyasya jñānena tadanyavijñānasyāghaṭamānatāṃ buddhvā paricodayati kathaṃ nu bagavaḥ sa ādeśa iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:51: paricoditaḥ punas tad eva hṛdi nihitaṃ jñānānandāmalatvaikasvarūpam aparicchedyamāhātmyaṃ satyasaṃkalpatvamiśrair anavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇair juṣṭam avikārasvarūpaṃ paraṃ brahmaiva nāmarūpavibhāgānarhasūkṣmacidacidvastuśarīraṃ svalīlāyai svasaṃkalpenānantavicitrasthiratrasasvarūpajagatsaṃsthānaṃ svāṃśenāvasthitam iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:52: tajjñānenāsya nikhilasya jñātatāṃ bruvaṃl lokadṛṣṭaṃ kāryakāraṇayor ananyatvaṃ darśayituṃ dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syād vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttikety eva satyam iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:53: ekam eva mṛddravyaṃ svaikadeśena nānāvyavahārāspadatvāya ghaṭaśarāvādinānāsaṃsthānāvasthārūpavikārāpannaṃ nānānāmadheyam api mṛttikāsaṃsthānaviśeṣatvān mṛddravyam evettham avasthitaṃ na vastvantaram iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:54: yathā mṛtpiṇḍavijñānena tatsaṃsthānaviśeṣarūpam ghaṭaśarāvādi sarvaṃ jñātam eva bhavatītyarthaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:55: tataḥ kṛtsnasya jagato brahmaikakāraṇatām ajānan putraḥ pṛcchati bhagavāṃs tv eva me tad bravītv iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:56: tataḥ sarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti brahmaiva sarvakāraṇam ity upadiśan sa hovāca sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:59: tasmin kāle jagataḥ sadātmakatāṃ sad eveti pratipādya,
GSP33ramvaspu:60: tatsṛṣṭikāle 'py aviśiṣṭam iti kṛtvaikam eveti sadāpannasya jagatas
GSP33ramvaspu:61: tadānīm avibhaktanāmarūpatāṃ pratipādya tatpratipādanenaiva sato jagadupādānatvaṃ pratipāditam iti svavyatiriktanimittakāraṇam advitīyapadena pratiṣiddham /
GSP33ramvaspu:62: tam ādeśam prākṣyo yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatītyādāv eva praśāstitaiva jagadupādānam iti hṛdi nihitam idānīm abhivyaktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:63: svayam eva jagadupādānaṃ jagannimittaṃ ca sat tad aikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti /
GSP33ramvaspu:64: tad etacchabdavācyaṃ paraṃ brahma sarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti satyasaṅkalpam avāptasamastakāmam api līlārthaṃ vicitrānantacidacinmiśrajagadrūpeṇāham eva bahu syāṃ tadarthaṃ prajāyeyeti svayam eva saṃkalpya svāṃśaikadeśād eva viyadādibhūtāni sṛṣṭvā punar api saiva sacchabdābhihitā parā devataivam aikṣata hantāham imās tisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇīti anena jīvenātmaneti jīvasya brahmātmakatvaṃ pratipādya brahmātmajīvānupraveśād eva kṛtsnasyācidvastunaḥ padārthatvam evaṃbhūtasyaiva sarvasya vastuno nāmabhāktvam iti ca darśayati /
GSP33ramvaspu:65: etaduktaṃ bhavati jīvātmā tu brahmaṇaḥ śarīratayā prakāratvād brahmātmakaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:67: evaṃbhūtasya jīvasya śarīratayā prakārabhūtāni devamanuṣyādisaṃsthānāni vastūnīti brahmātmakāni tāni sarvāṇi /
GSP33ramvaspu:68: ato devo manuṣyo rākṣasaḥ paśur mṛgaḥ pakṣī vṛkṣo latā kāṣṭhaṃ śilā tṛṇaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa ityādayaḥ sarve prakṛtipratyayayogenābhidhāyakatayā prasiddhāḥ śabdā loke tattadvācyatayā pratīyamānatattatsaṃsthānavastumukhena tadabhimānijīvatadantaryāmiparamātmaparyantasaṃghātasyaiva vācakā iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:69: evaṃ samastacidacidātmakaprapañcasya sadupādānatāsannimittatāsadādhāratāsanniyamyatāsaccheṣatādi sarvaṃ ca sanmūlāḥ somyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sadāyatanāḥ satpratiṣṭhā ityādinā vistareṇa pratipādya kāryakāraṇabhāvādimukhenāitadātmyam idaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyam iti kṛtsnasya jagato brahmātmakatvam eva satyam iti pratipādya kṛtsnasya jagataḥ sa evātmā kṛtsnaṃ jagat tasya śarīraṃ tasmāt tvaṃśabdavācyam api jīvaprakāraṃ brahmaiveti sarvasya brahmātmakatvaṃ pratijñātaṃ tat tvam asīti jīvaviśeṣa upasaṃhṛtam /
GSP33ramvaspu:71: aitadātmyam idaṃ sarvam iti cetanācetanaprapañcam idaṃ sarvam iti nirdiśya tasya prapañcasyaiṣa ātmeti pratipāditaḥ,
GSP33ramvaspu:73: tad idaṃ brahmātmakatvaṃ kim ātmaśarīrabhāvenota svarūpeṇeti vivecanīyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:74: svarūpeṇa ced brahmaṇaḥ satyasaṅkalpādyaḥ tad aikṣata bahu syaṃ prajāyeyety upakramāvagatā bādhitā bhavanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:75: śarīrātmabhāvena ca tad ātmakatvaṃ śrutyantarād viśeṣato 'vagatam antaḥpraviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānāṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:77: sarvātmā sarveṣāṃ janānām ātmā sarvaṃ cāsya śarīram iti viśeṣato jñāyate brahmātmakatvam /
GSP33ramvaspu:78: ya ātmani tiṣṭhann ātmano 'ntaro yam ātmā na veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ ya ātmānam antaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛta iti ca
GSP33ramvaspu:79: / atrāpy anena jīvenātmanetīdam eva jñāyata iti pūrvam evoktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:80: ataḥ sarvasya cidacidvastuno brahmaśarīratvāt sarvaprakāraṃ sarvaśabdair brahmaivābhidhīyata iti tat tvam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena jīvaśarīratayā jīvaprakāraṃ brahmaivābhihitam /
GSP33ramvaspu:81: evam abhihite saty ayam artho jñāyate tvam iti yaḥ pūrvaṃ dehasyādhiṣṭhātṛtayā pratītaḥ sa paramātmaśarīratayā paramātmaprakārabhūtaḥ paramātmaparyantaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:82: atas tvam iti śabdas tvatprakāraviśiṣṭaṃ tvadantaryāmiṇam evācaṣṭa iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:83: anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇīti brahmātmakatayaiva jīvasya śarīriṇaḥ svanāmabhāktvāt tat tvam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyapravṛttayor dvayor api padayor brahmaiva vācyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:84: tatra ca tatpadaṃ jagatkāraṇabhūtaṃ sakalakalyāṇaguṇagaṇākaraṃ nirvadyaṃ nirvikāram ācaṣṭe
GSP33ramvaspu:85: tvam iti ca tad eva brahma jīvāntaryāmirūpeṇa saśarīraprakāraviśiṣṭam ācaṣṭe /
GSP33ramvaspu:86: tad evaṃ pravṛttinimittabhedenaikasmin brahmaṇy eva tat tvam iti dvayoḥ padayor vṛttir uktā /
GSP33ramvaspu:87: brahmaṇo niravadyaṃ nirvikāraṃ sakalakalyāṇaguṇagaṇākaratvaṃ jagatkāraṇatvaṃ cābādhitam /
GSP33ramvaspu:88: aśrutavedāntāḥ puruṣāḥ padārthāḥ sarve jīvātmanaś ca brahmātmakā iti na paśyati sarvaśabdānāṃ ca kevaleṣu tattatpadārtheṣu vācyaikadeśeṣu vācyaparyavasānaṃ manyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:89: idānīṃ vedāntavākyaśravaṇena brahmakāryatayā tadantaryāmitayā ca sarvasya brahmātmakatvaṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ tattatprakārasaṃsthitabrahmavācitvaṃ ca jānanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:90: nanv evaṃ gavādiśabdānāṃ tattatpadārthavācitayā vyutpattir bādhitā syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:91: naivaṃ sarve śabdā acijjīvaviśiṣṭasya paramātmano vācakā ity uktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:93: tatra laukikāḥ puruṣāḥ śabdaṃ vyāharantaḥ śabdavācye pradhānāṃśasya paramātmanaḥ pratyakṣādyaparicchedyatvād vācyaikadeśabhūte vācyasamāptiṃ manyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:95: evam eva vaidikāḥ sarve śabdāḥ paramātmaparyantān svārthān bodhayanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:96: vaidikā eva sarve śabdā vedādav uddhṛtyoddhṛtya pareṇaiva brahmaṇā sarvapadārthān pūrvavat sṛṣṭvā teṣu paramātmaparyanteṣu pūrvavan nāmatayā prayuktāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:97: tad āha manuḥ sarveṣāṃ tu nāmāni karmāṇi ca pṛthak pṛthak /
GSP33ramvaspu:101: āha ca bhagavān parāśaraḥ nāma rūpaṃ bhūtānāṃ kṛtyānāṃ prapañcanam /
GSP33ramvaspu:104: śrutiś ca sūryācandramasau dhātā yathāpūrvam akalpayad iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:105: sūryādīn pūrvavat parikalpya nāmāni ca pūrvavac cakāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:108: sarvasya brahmakāryatvapratipādanena tadātmakatayaiva satyatvaṃ nānyatheti tat satyam ityuktam
GSP33ramvaspu:109: yathā dṛṣṭānte sarvasya mṛdvikārasya mṛdātmanaiva satyatvam /
GSP33ramvaspu:110: śodhakavākyāny api niravadyaṃ sarvakalyāṇaguṇākaraṃ paraṃ brahma bodhayanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:112: nanu ca jñānamātraṃ brahmeti pratipādite nirviśeṣajñānamātraṃ brahmeti niścīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:114: svarūpanirūpaṇadharmaśabdā hi dharmamukhena svarūpam api pratipādayanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:116: tad āha sūtrakāraḥ tadguṇasāratvāt tadvyapadeśaḥ prājñavat /
GSP33ramvaspu:117: yāvad ātmabhāvitatvāc ca na doṣa iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:118: jñānena dharmeṇa svarūpam api nirūpitaṃ na jñānamātraṃ brahmeti /
GSP33ramvaspu:119: katham idam avagamyata iti ced yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavid ityādijñātṛtvaśruteḥ parāsya śaktir vividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:120: vijñātāram are kena vijānīyād ityādiśrutiśatasamadhigatam idam /
GSP33ramvaspu:122: ataḥ satyajñānādipadāni svārthabhūtajñānādiviśiṣṭam eva brahma pratipādayanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:123: tat tvam iti dvayor api padayoḥ svārthaprahāṇena nirviśeṣavastusvarūpopasthāpanaparatve mukhyārthaparityāgaś ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:126: yathā so 'yam ity atra sa iti śabdena deśāntarakālāntarasaṃbandhī puruṣaḥ pratīyata ayam iti ca saṃnihitadeśavartamānakālasaṃbandhī, tayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyenāikyaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:127: tatraikasya yugapadviruddhadeśakālasaṃbandhitayā pratītir na ghaṭata iti dvayor padayoḥ svarūpamātropasthāpanaparatvaṃ svarūpasya cāikyaṃ pratipadyata iti cen naitad evam /
GSP33ramvaspu:128: so 'yaṃ devadatta ity atrāpi lakṣaṇāgandho na vidyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:134: lakṣaṇāyām api na dvayor api padayor lakṣaṇāsamāśrayaṇam /
GSP33ramvaspu:138: evam atrāpi jagatkāraṇabūtasyaiva parasya brahmaṇo jīvāntaryāmitayā jīvātmatvam aviruddham iti pratipāditam /
GSP33ramvaspu:139: yathā bhūtayor eva hi dvayor aikyaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:140: tatparityāgena svarūpamātrāikyaṃ na sāmānādhikaraṇyārthaḥ bhinnapravṛttinimittānāṃ śabdānām ekasminn arthe vṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti hi tadvidaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:143: upakrame hi tad aikṣata bahu syām ityādinā satyasaṃkalpatvaṃ jagadekakāraṇatvam apy uktam
GSP33ramvaspu:145: api cārthabhedatatsaṃsargaviśeṣabodhanakṛtapadavākyasya svarūpatālabdhapramāṇabhāvasya śabdasya nirviśeṣavastubodhanāsāmarthān na nirviśeṣavastuni śabdaḥ pramāṇam /
GSP33ramvaspu:146: nirviśeṣa ityādiśabdās tu kenacid viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭatayāvagatasya vastuno vastvantaragataviśeṣaniṣedhaparatayā bodhakāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:149: atha syāt nāsmābhir nirviśeṣe svayaṃprakāśe vastuni śabdaḥ pramāṇam ity ucyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:151: sarvaiḥ śabdais taduparāgaviśeṣā jñātṛtvādayaḥ sarve nirasyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:152: sarveṣu viśeṣeṣu nivṛtteṣu vastumātram anavacchinnaṃ svayaṃprakāśaṃ svata evāvatiṣṭhata iti
GSP33ramvaspu:154: kena śabdena tadvastu nirdiśya tadgataviśeṣā nirasyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:158: jñā avabodhana iti sakarmakaḥ sakartṛkaḥ kriyāviśeṣaḥ kriyāntaravyāvartakasvabhāvaviśeṣaś ca prakṛtyāvagamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:160: svataḥsiddhāv apy etatsvabhāvaviśeṣavirahe siddhir eva na syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:162: brahmasvarūpaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sarvadā svayam eva prakāśate cen na tasminn anyadharmādhyāsaḥ saṃbhavati
GSP33ramvaspu:165: tataś ca śāstrīyanivartakajñānasya brahmaṇi tirohitāṃśo viṣayaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:166: anyathā tasya nivartakatvaṃ ca na syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:168: ekaś ced viśeṣo jñānamātre vastuni śabdenābhidhīyate sa ca brahmaviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavatīti sarvaśrutipratipāditasarvaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaṃ brahma bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:169: ataḥ prāmāṇikānāṃ na kenāpi pramāṇena nirviśeṣavastusiddhiḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:172: vastusaṃsthānaviśeṣarūpatvād gotvāder nirvikalpatadaśāyām api sasaṃsthānam eva vastv ittham iti pratīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:174: saṃsthānarūpaprakārākhyasya padārthasyānekavastuniṣṭhatayānekavastuviśeṣaṇatvaṃ dvitīyādipratyayāvagamyam iti dvitīyādipratyayāḥ savikalpakā ity ucyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:175: ata evaikasya padārthasya bhinnābhinnatvarūpeṇa dvyātmakatvaṃ viruddhaṃ pratyuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:177: prakāratvād eva pṛthaksiddhyanarhatvaṃ pṛthaganupalambhaś ceti na dvyātmakatvasiddhiḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:178: api ca nirviśeṣavastvādinā svayaṃprakāśe vastuni taduparāgaviśeṣāḥ sarvaiḥ śabdair nirasyanta iti vadatā ke te śabdā niṣedhakā iti vaktavyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:179: vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttikety eva satyam iti vikāranāmadheyayor vācārambhaṇamātratvāt
GSP33ramvaspu:180: yat tatra kāraṇatayopalakṣyate vastumātraṃ tad eva satyam anyad asatyam itīyaṃ śrutir vadatīti cen naitad upapadyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:181: ekasmin vijñāte sarvaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavatīti pratijñāte
GSP33ramvaspu:183: vikārādyavasthāviśeṣeṇa pāramārthikenaiva nāmarūpam avasthitaṃ cet tatraikasmin vijñāte tasmād vilakṣaṇasaṃsthānāntaram api tad eveti tatra dṛṣṭānto 'yaṃ nidarśitaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:186: vācārambhaṇam iti vācā vyavahāreṇārabhyata ity ārambhaṇam
GSP33ramvaspu:188: ghaṭaśarāvādirūpeṇāvasthitāyās tasyā eva mṛttikāyā anyāni nāmadheyāni vyavahārāś cānyaddaśāḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:189: tathāpi sarvatra mṛttikādravyam ekam eva nānāsaṃsthānanānānāmadheyābhyāṃ nānāvyavahāreṇa cārabhyata ityetad eva satyam ity anenānyajñānenānyajñānasaṃbhavo nidarśitaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:190: nātra kiṃcid vastu niṣidhyata iti pūrvam evāyam arthaḥ prapañcitaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:191: api ca yenāśrutaṃ śrutam ityādinā brahmavyatiriktasya sarvasya mithyātvaṃ pratijñātaṃ ced yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍenetyādidṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyavikalaḥ syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:192: rajjusarpādivan mṛttikāvikārasya ghaṭaśarāvāder asatyatvaṃ śvetaketoḥ śuśrūṣoḥ pramāṇāntareṇa yuktyā cāsiddham ity etad api siṣādhayiṣitam iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:194: sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam evādvitīyam ity atra sad evaikam evety avadhāraṇadvayenādvitīyam ity anena ca sanmātrātirekisajātīyavijātīyāḥ sarve viśeṣā niṣiddhā iti pratīyata iti cenn etad evam /
GSP33ramvaspu:195: kāryakāraṇabhāvāvasthādvayāvasthitasyaikasya vastuna ekāvasthāvasthitasya jñānenāvasthāntarāvasthitasyāpi vastvaikyena jñātatāṃ dṛṣṭāntena darśayitvā śvetaketor aprajñātaṃ sarvasya brahmakāraṇatvaṃ ca vaktuṃ sad eva somyedam ity ārabdham /
GSP33ramvaspu:198: idaṃśabdavācyasya prapañcasya sadāpattirūpāṃ kriyāṃ sadravyatāṃ ca vadati /
GSP33ramvaspu:200: etasmin pratipādite 'sya jagataḥ sadupādānatā pratipāditā bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:202: sarvavilakṣaṇatvād asya sarvajñasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvaśaktiyogo na viruddha ity advitīyapadam adhiṣṭhātrantaraṃ nivārayati /
GSP33ramvaspu:204: kāścana śrutayaḥ prathamam upādānakāraṇatvaṃ pratipādya nimittakāraṇam api tad eveti pratipādayanti
GSP33ramvaspu:206: anyāś ca śrutayo brahmaṇo nimittakāraṇatvam anujñāyāsyaivopādānatādi katham iti
GSP33ramvaspu:207: paricodya, sarvaśaktiyuktatvād upādānakāraṇaṃ taditarāśeṣopakaraṇaṃ ca brahmaiveti pariharanti kiṃsvid vanaṃ ka u sa vṛkṣa āsīd yato dyāvāpṛthivī
GSP33ramvaspu:208: niṣṭakṣurmaṇīṣiṇo manasā pṛcchated utdyad adhyatiṣṭhad bhuvanāni dhārayan
GSP33ramvaspu:209: / brahma vanaṃ brahma sa vṛkṣa āsīd yato dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣur manīṣiṇo manasā vibravīmi vaḥ brahmādhyatiṣṭhad bhuvanāni /
GSP33ramvaspu:210: dhārayann iti sāmānyato dṛṣṭena virodham āśaṅkya brahmaṇaḥ sarvavilakṣaṇatvena parihāra uktaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:211: ataḥ sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ity atrāpy agra ityādyanekaviśeṣā brahmaṇo pratipāditāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:213: praty uta jagadbrahmaṇoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvajñāpanāyāgra iti kālaviśeṣasadbhāvaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:214: āsīd iti kriyāviśeṣo, jagadupādānatā jagannimittatā ca, nimittopādānayor bhedanirasanena tasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ sarvaśaktiyogaś cety aprajñātaḥ sahasraśo viśeṣā eva pratipāditāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:215: yato vāstavakāryakāraṇabhāvādivijñāne pravṛttam ata evāsad evedam agra āsīd ityārabhyāsatkāryavādaniṣedhaś ca kriyate kutas tu khalu somyaivaṃ syād iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:217: tad evopapādayati katham asataḥ saj jāyeteti /
GSP33ramvaspu:222: ekam eva kāraṇabhūtaṃ dravyam avasthāntarayogena kāryam ity ucyata ity ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratipipādayiṣitam /
GSP33ramvaspu:224: tathā hi nimittasamavāyyasamavāyiprabhṛtiḥ kāraṇair avayavyākhyaṃ kāryaṃ dravyāntaram evotpadyata iti kāraṇabhūtād vastunaḥ kāryasya vastvantaratvān na tajjñānenāsya jñātatā katham api saṃbhavatīti katham avayavi dravyāntaraṃ nirasyata iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:225: kāraṇagatāvasthāntarayogasya dravyāntarotpattivādinaḥ saṃpratipannasyaivaikatvanāmāntarāder upapādakatvād dravyāntarādarśanāc ceti kāraṇam evāvasthāntarāpannaṃ kāryam ity ucyata ity uktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:227: tathā hy ekaṃ cidrūpaṃ satyam evāvidyāc chāditaṃ jagadrūpeṇa vivartata ity avidyāśrayatvāya mūlakāraṇaṃ satyam ity abhyupagantavyam ity asatkāryavādanirāsaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:229: ekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñādṛṣṭāntamukhena satkāryavādasyaiva prasaktatvād ity uktam
GSP33ramvaspu:231: yasya hi cetanagatadoṣaḥ pāramārthiko doṣāśrayatvaṃ ca pāramārthikaṃ tasya pāramārthikadoṣeṇa yuktasyāpāramārthikagandharvanagarādidarśanam upapannaṃ, yasya tu doṣaś cāpāramārthiko doṣāśrayatvaṃ cāpāramārthikaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:232: tasyāpāramārthikenāpy āśrayeṇa tad upapannam iti bhavatpakṣe na niradhiṣṭhānabhramāsaṃbhavaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:233: śodhakeṣv api satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahma, ānando brahmetyādiṣu vākyeṣu
GSP33ramvaspu:234: sāmānyādhikaraṇyavyutpattisiddhānekaguṇaviśiṣṭaikārthāvabodhanam aviruddham iti sarvaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ brahmābhidhīyata iti pūrvam evoktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:235: athāta ādeśo neti netīti bahudhā niṣedho dṛṣyata iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:237: dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe mūrtaṃ caivāmūrtaṃ ceti mūrtāmūrtātmakaḥ prapañcaḥ sarvo 'pi niṣidhyata iti cen naivam /
GSP33ramvaspu:238: brahmaṇo rūpatayāprajñātaṃ sarvaṃ rūpatayopadiśya punar tad eva niṣeddhum ayuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:239: prakṣālanād dhi paṅkasya dūrād asparśanaṃ varam iti nyāyāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:241: sūtrakāraḥ svayam eva vadati prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūya iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:242: uttaratra atha nāmadheyaṃ saty asya satyaṃ prāṇā vai satyaṃ teṣām eṣa satyam iti satyādiguṇagaṇasya pratipāditatvāt pūrvaprakṛtaitāvanmātraṃ na bhavati brahmeti, brahmaṇa etāvanmātratā pratiṣidhyata iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:243: neha nānāsti kiṃcanetyādinā nānātvapratiṣedha eva dṛṣyata iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:244: atrāpy uttaratra sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśana iti satyasaṅkalpatvasarveśvaratvapratipādanāc cetanavastuśarīra īśvara iti sarvaprakārasaṃsthitaḥ sa eka eveti tatpratyanīkābrahmātmakanānātvaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ na bhavadabhimatam /
GSP33ramvaspu:245: sarvāsv evaṃprakārāsu śrutiṣv iyam eva sthitir iti na kvacid api brahmaṇaḥ saviśeṣatvaniṣedhakavācī ko 'pi śabdo dṛśyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:246: api ca nirviśeṣajñānamātraṃ brahma tac cāchādikāvidyātirohitasvarūpaṃ svagatanānātvaṃ paśyatīty ayam artho na ghaṭate /
GSP33ramvaspu:248: svarūpātirekiprakāśadharmānabhyupagamena prakāśasyaiva svarūpatvāt svarūpanāśa eva syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:249: prakāśaparyāyaṃ jñānaṃ nityaṃ sa ca prakāśo 'vidyātirohita iti bāliśabhāṣitam idam /
GSP33ramvaspu:250: avidyayā prakāśatirohita iti prakāśotpattipratibandho vidyamānasya vināśo vā /
GSP33ramvaspu:253: satyām apy avidyāyāṃ brahmaṇi na kiṃcit tirohitam iti nānātvaṃ paśyatīti bhavatām ayaṃ vyavahāraḥ satsv anirvacanīya eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:256: tasya ca devādisvarūpātmābhimāne svarūpaprakāśatirodhānam avaśyam āśrayaṇīyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:259: kiṃ cāsmākam ekasminn evātmani bhavadudīritaṃ durghaṭatvam bhavatām ātmānantyābhyupagamāt sarveṣv ayaṃ doṣaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:260: atrocyate svabhāvato malapratyanīkānantajñānānandaikasvarūpaṃ svābhāvikānavadhikātiśayāparimitodāraguṇasāgaraṃ nimeṣakāṣṭhākalāmuhūrtādiparārdhaparyantāparimitavyavacchedasvarūpasarvotpattisthitivināśādisarvapariṇāmanimittabhūtakālakṛtapariṇāmāspaṣṭānantamahāvibhūti svalīlāparikarasvāṃśabhūtānantabaddhamuktanānāvidhacetanatadbhogyabhūtānantavicitrapariṇāmaśakticetanetaravastujātāntaryāmitvakṛtasarvaśaktiśarīratvasarvaprakarśāvasthānāvasthitaṃ paraṃ brahmaiva vedyaṃ,
GSP33ramvaspu:261: tatsākṣātkārakṣamabhagavaddvaipāyanaparāśaravālmīkimanuyājñavalkyagautamāpastambaprabhṛtimunigaṇapraṇītavidhyarthavādamantrasvarūpavedamūletihāsapurāṇadharmaśāstropabhṛṃhitaparamārthabhūtānādinidhanāvicchinnapāṭhasaṃpradāyargyajuḥsāmātharvarūpānantaśākhaṃ vedaṃ cābhyupagacchatām asmākaṃ kiṃ na setsyati /
GSP33ramvaspu:262: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā dvaipāyanena mahābhārate yo mām ajam anādiṃ ca vetti lokamaheśvaram
GSP33ramvaspu:263: dvāv imau puraṣau loke kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:265: uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:267: kālaṃ ca pacate tatra na kālas tatra vai prabhūḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:268: ete vai nirayās tāta sthānasya paramātmanaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:270: krīḍā harer idaṃ sarvaṃ kṣaram ity avadhāryatām //
GSP33ramvaspu:271: kṛṣṇa eva hi lokānām utpattir api cāpyayaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:272: kṛṣṇasya hi kṛte bhūtam idaṃ viśvaṃ carācaram //
GSP33ramvaspu:274: kṛṣṇasya hi kṛta iti kṛṣṇasya śeṣabhūtaṃ sarvam ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:275: bhagavatā parāśareṇāpy uktam śuddhe mahāvibhūtyākhye pare brahmaṇi śabdyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:279: evam eṣa mahāśabdo maitreya bhagavān iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:282: śabdo 'yaṃ nopacāreṇa tv anyatra hy upacārataḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:285: kalāmuhūrtādimayaś ca kālo na yadvibhūteḥ pariṇāmahetuḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:292: āpastambenāpi pūḥ prāṇinaḥ sarva eva guhāśayasyeti /
GSP33ramvaspu:293: sarve prāṇino guhāśayas paramātmanaḥ pūḥ puraṃ śarīram ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:298: evam abhyupagacchatām asmākam ātmadharmabhūtasya caitanyasya svābhāvikasyāpi karmaṇā pāramārthikaṃ saṃkocaṃ vikāsaṃ ca bruvatāṃ sarvam idaṃ parihṛtam /
GSP33ramvaspu:299: bhavas tu prakāśa eva svarūpam iti prakāśo na dharmabhūtas tasya saṃkocavikāsau vā nābyupagamyete
GSP33ramvaspu:301: avidyā cet tirodhānaṃ tirodhānabhūtatayāvidyayā svarūpabhūtaprakāśanāśa iti pūrvam evoktam
GSP33ramvaspu:302: asmākaṃ tv avidyārūpeṇa karmaṇā svarūpanityadharmabhūtaprakāśaḥ saṃkucitaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:304: yathoktam avidyā karmasaṃjñānyā tṛtīyā śaktir iṣyate //
GSP33ramvaspu:305: yathā kṣetraśaktiḥ sā veṣṭitā nṛpa sarvagā /
GSP33ramvaspu:310: kṣetrajñānāṃ svadharmabhūtasya jñānasya karmasaṃjñāvidyayā saṃkocaṃ vikāsaṃ ca darśayati /
GSP33ramvaspu:311: api cācchādikāvidyā śrutibhiś cāikyopadeśabalāc ca brahmasvarūpatirodhānaheyadoṣarūpāśrīyate tasyāś ca mithyārūpatvena prapañcavatsvadarśanamūladoṣāpekṣatvāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:312: na sā mithyā darśanamūladoṣaḥ syād iti brahmaiva mithyādarśanamūlaṃ syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:314: mithyārūpatvād eva brahmadṛśyatvenaivānāditvāt taddarśanamūlaparamārthadoṣānabhyupagamāc ca brahmaiva taddarśanamūlaṃ syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:316: ata evedam api nirastam ekam eva śarīraṃ jīvavat, nirjīvānītarāṇi śarīrāṇi svapnadṛṣṭanānāvidhānantaśarīrāṇāṃ yathā nirjīvatvam /
GSP33ramvaspu:317: tatra svapne draṣṭuḥ śarīram ekam eva jīvavat /
GSP33ramvaspu:319: anenaikenaiva parikalpitatvāj jīvā mithyābhūtā iti brahmaṇā svasvarūpavyatiriktasya jīvabhāvasya sarvaśarīrāṇāṃ ca kalpitatvād ekasminn api śarīre śarīravaj jīvabhāvasya ca mithyārūpatvāt sarvāṇi śarīrāṇi mithyārūpāṇi, tatra jīvabhāvaś ca mithyārūpa ity ekasya śarīrasya tatra jīvabhāvasya ca na kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:320: asmākaṃ tu svapne draṣṭuḥ svaśarīrasya tasminn ātmasadbhāvasya ca prabodhavelāyām abādhitatvān anyeṣāṃ śarīrāṇāṃ tadgatajīvānāṃ ca bādhitatvāt te sarve mithyābhūtāḥ svaśarīram ekaṃ tasmiñ jīvabhāvaś ca paramārtha iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:321: api ca kena vā vidyānivṛttiḥ sā kīdṛśīti vivecanīyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:323: anirvacanīyapratyanīkaṃ nirvacanīyaṃ tac ca sad vāsad vā dvirūpaṃ vā koṭyantaraṃ na vidyate
GSP33ramvaspu:324: brahmavyatirekeṇaitadabhyupagame punar avidyā na nivṛttā syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:325: brahmaiva cen nivṛttis tatprāg apy aviśiṣṭam iti vedāntajñānāt pūrvam eva nivṛttiḥ syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:326: aikyajñānaṃ nivartakaṃ tadabhāvāt saṃsāra iti bhavaddarśanaṃ vihanyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:327: kiñ ca nivartakajñānasyāpy avidyārūparvāt tannivartanaṃ keneti vaktavyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:328: nivartakajñānaṃ svetarasamastabhedaṃ nivartya kṣaṇikatvād eva svayam eva vinaśyati dāvānalaviṣanāśanaviṣāntaravad iti cen na /
GSP33ramvaspu:329: nivartakajñānasya brahmavyatiriktatvena tatsvarūpatadutpattivināśānāṃ mithyārūpatvāt tadvināśarūpā vidyā tiṣṭhaty eveti tadvināśadarśanasya nivartakaṃ vaktacyam eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:335: brahmaṇo nivartakajñānaṃ prati jñātṛtvaṃ kiṃ svarūpam utādhyastam /
GSP33ramvaspu:336: adhyastaṃ ced ayam adhyāsas tanmūlavidyāntaraṃ ca nivartakajñānaviṣayatayā tiṣṭhaty eva
GSP33ramvaspu:338: sarvasya hi jñānasya trirūpakatvavirahe jñānatvam eva hīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:340: jñānasya trirūpatvavirahe bhavatāṃ svarūpabhūtajñānavan nivartakajñānam apy anivartakaṃ syāt
GSP33ramvaspu:343: nivartakajñānasvarūpajñātṛtvaṃ ca svanivartyāntargatam iti vacanaṃ bhūtalavyatiriktaṃ kṛtsnaṃ chinnaṃ devadattenety asyām eva chedanakriyāyām asyāś chedanakriyāyāś chettṛtvasya ca chedyāntarbhāvavacanavad upahāsyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:344: api ca nikhilabhedanivartakam idam aikyajñānaṃ kena jātam iti vimarśanīyam
GSP33ramvaspu:346: tasyā brahmavyatiriktāyā avidyāparikalpitatvāt prapañcabādhakajñānasyotpādakatvaṃ na saṃbhavati
GSP33ramvaspu:347: tathā hi duṣṭakāraṇajātam api rajjusarpajñānaṃ na duṣṭakāraṇajanyena rajjur iyaṃ na sarpa iti jñānena bādhyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:348: rajjusarpajñānabhaye vartamāne kenacidbhrāntena puruṣeṇa rajjur iyaṃ na sarpa ityukte 'py ayaṃ bhrānta iti jñāte sati tadvacanaṃ rajjusarpajñānasya bādhakaṃ na bhavati bhayaṃ ca na nivartate /
GSP33ramvaspu:349: prayojakajñānavataḥ śravaṇavelāyām eva hi brahmavyatiriktatvena śruter api bhrāntimūlatvaṃ jñātam iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:350: nivartakajñānasya jñātus tatsāmagrībhūtaśāstrasya ca brahmavyatiriktatayā yadi bādhyatvam ucyate hanta tarhi prapañcanivṛtter mithyātvam āpatatīti prapañcasya satyatā syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:352: kiñca tat tvam asy ādivākyaṃ na prapañcasya bādhakam /
GSP33ramvaspu:354: nanu ca svapne kasmiṃścid bhaye vartamāne svapnadaśāyām evāyaṃ svapna iti jñāte sati pūrvabhayanivṛttir dṛṣṭā /
GSP33ramvaspu:357: / svapnavelāyām eva so 'pi svapna iti jñāte sati punarbhayānivṛttir eva
GSP33ramvaspu:359: śravaṇavelāyām eva so'pi svapna iti jñātam evetyuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:360: yad api cedam uktaṃ bhrāntiparikalpitatvena mithyārūpam api śāstram advitīyaṃ brahmeti bodhayati tasya sato brahmaṇo viṣayasya paścāt tanabādhādarśanād brahma susthitam eveti /
GSP33ramvaspu:362: śūnyam eva tat tvam iti vākyena tasyāpi bādhitatvāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:364: sad advitīyaṃ brahmeti vākyam api bhrāntimūlam iti tvayaivoktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:366: sarvaśūnyavādino brahmavyatiriktavastumithyātvavādinaś ca svapakṣasādhanapramāṇapāramārthyānabyupagamenābhiyuktair vādānadhikāra eva pratipāditaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:369: api ca pratyakṣadṛṣṭasya prapañcasya mithyātvaṃ kena pramāṇena sādhyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:370: pratyakṣasya doṣamūlatvenānyathāsiddhisaṃbhavān nirdoṣaṃ śāstram ananyathāsiddhaṃ pratyakṣasya bādhakam iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:371: kena doṣeṇa jātaṃ pratyakṣam anantabhedaviṣayam iti vaktavyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:373: hanta tarhy anenaiva doṣeṇa jātaṃ śāstram apīty ekadoṣamūlatvāc chāstrapratyakṣayor na bādhyabādhakabhāvasiddhiḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:375: śāstraṃ tu pratyakṣādyaparicchedyasarvāntarātmatvasatyatvādyanantaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭabrahmasvarūpatadupāsanādyārādhanaprakāratatprāptipūrvakatatprasādalabhyaphalaviśeṣatadaniṣṭakaraṇamūlanigrahaviśeṣaviṣayam iti na śātrapratyakṣayor virodhaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:376: anādinidhanāvicchinnapāṭasaṃpradāyatādyanekaguṇaviśiṣṭasya śāstrasya balīyastvaṃ vadatā pratyakṣapāramārthyam avaśyam abhyupagantavyam ity alam anena śrutiśatavitativātavegaparāhatakudṛṣṭiduṣṭayuktijālatūlanirasanenety uparamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:377: dvitīye tu pakṣa upādhibrahmavyatiriktavastvantarānabhyupagamād brahmaṇy evopādhisaṃsargād aupādhikāḥ sarve doṣā brahmaṇy eva bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:379: yathā ghaṭākāśādeḥ paricchinnatayā mahākāśād vailakṣaṇyaṃ parasparabhedaś ca dṛśyate tatrasthā guṇā vā doṣā vānavacchinne mahākāśe na saṃbadhyante evam upādhikṛtabhedavyavasthitajīvagatā doṣā anupahite pare brahmaṇi na saṃbadhyanta iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:381: niravayavasyākāśasyānavacchedyasya ghaṭādibhiś chedāsaṃbhavāt tenaivākāśena ghaṭādayaḥ saṃyuktā iti brahmaṇo 'py acchedyatvād brahmaivopādhisaṃyuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:384: ākāśasyaikasyaiva pradeśabhedena ghaṭādisaṃyogād ghaṭādau gacchati tasya ca pradeśabhedasyāniyama iti tadvad brahmaṇy eva pradeśabhedāniyamenopādhisaṃsargād upādhau gacchati saṃyuktaviyuktabrahmapradeśabhedāc ca brahmaṇy evopādhisaṃsargaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe bandhamokṣau syātām iti santaḥ parihasanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:385: niravayavasyaivākāśasya śrotrendriyatve 'pīndriyavyavasthāvad brahmaṇy api vyavasthopapadyata iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:387: ākāśasya tu sarveṣāṃ śarīreṣu gacchat svaniyamena sarvapradeśasaṃyoga iti brahmaṇy upādhisaṃyogapradeśāniyama eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:390: vaikārikād ahaṃkārād ekādaśendriyāṇi jāyanta iti hi vaidikāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:391: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā parāśareṇa taijasānīndriyāṇy āhur devā vaikārikā daśa /
GSP33ramvaspu:392: ekādaśaṃ manaś cātra devā vaikārikāḥ smṛtāḥ // iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:395: sa ca kramāt sāttviko rājasas tāmasaś ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:396: tatra tāmasād bhūtāder ākāśādīni bhūtāni jāyanta iti sṛṣṭikramam uktvā taijasād rājasād ahaṃkārād ekadaśendriyāṇi jāyanta iti paramatam upanyasya sāttvikāhaṃkārād vaikārikānīndriyāṇi jāyanta iti svamatam ucyate devā vaikārikāḥ smṛtā iti
GSP33ramvaspu:398: evam indriyāṇām āhaṃkārikāṇāṃ bhūtaiś cāpy āyanaṃ mahābhārata ucyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:399: bhautikatve 'pīndriyāṇām ākāśādibhūtavikāratvād evākāśādibhūtapariṇāmaviśeṣā vyavasthitā eva śarīravat puruṣāṇām indriyāṇi bhavantīti brahmaṇy acchedye niravayave nirvikāre tv aniyamenānantaheyopādhisaṃsargadoṣo duṣparihara eveti śraddadhānānām evāyam pakṣa iti śāstravido na bahu manyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:401: niravadyatā ca brahmaṇaḥ śaktipariṇāma iti cet
GSP33ramvaspu:407: tṛtīye 'pi pakṣe jīvabrahmaṇor bhedavad abhedasya cābhyupagamāt tasya ca tadbhāvāt saubharibhedavac ca svāvatārabhedavac ca sarvasyeśvarabhedatāt sarve jīvagatā doṣās tasyaiva syuḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:409: īśvaraḥ svarūpeṇaiva suranaratiryaksthāvarādibhedenāvasthita iti hi tadātmakatvavarṇanaṃ kriyate
GSP33ramvaspu:410: tathā saty ekamṛtpiṇḍārabdhaghaṭaśarāvādigatāny udakāharaṇādīni sarvakāryāṇi yathā tasyaiva bhavanti, evaṃ sarvajīvagatasukhaduḥkhādi sarvam īśvaragatam eva syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:411: ghaṭaśarāvādisaṃsthānānupayuktamṛddravyaṃ yathā kāryāntarānvitam evam eva surapaśumanujādijīvatvānupayukteśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ satyasaṃkalpatvādikalyāṇaguṇākara iti cet satyaṃ sa eveśvara ekenāṃśena kalyāṇaguṇagaṇākaraḥ sa evānyenāṃśena heyaguṇākara ity uktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:415: / ekasyaivānekāṃśena nityaduḥkhitvād aṃśāntareṇa sukhitvam api neśvaratvāya kalpate /
GSP33ramvaspu:416: yathā devadattasyaikasmin haste candanapaṅkānulepakeyūrakaṭakāṅgulīyālaṃkāras tasyaivānyasmin haste mudgarābhighātaḥ kālānalajvālānupraveśaś ca tadvad eveśvarasya syād iti brahmājñānapakṣād api pāpīyān ayaṃ bhedābhedapakṣaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:417: aparimitaduḥkhasya pāramārthikatvāt saṃsāriṇām anantatvena dustaratvāc ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:420: / īśvarasya svarūpeṇa tādātmyavarṇane syād ayaṃ doṣaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:421: ātmaśarīrabhāvena tu tādātmyapratipādane na kaścid doṣaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:422: praty uta nikhilabhuvananiyamanādir mahān ayaṃ guṇagaṇaḥ pratipādito bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:424: api caikasya vastuno bhinnābhinnatvaṃ viruddhatvān na saṃbhavatītyuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:425: ghaṭasya paṭād bhinnatve sati tasya tasminn abhāvaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:426: abhinnatve sati tasya ca bhāva iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:427: ekasmin kāle caikasmin deśe caikasya hi padārthasya yugapatsadbhāvo 'sadbhāvaś ca viruddhaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:428: jātyātmanā bhāvo vyaktyātmanā cābhāva iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:429: jāter muṇḍena cābhāve sati khaṇḍe muṇḍasyāpi sadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:430: khaṇḍena ca jāter abhinnatve sadbhāvo bhinnatve cāsadbhāvaḥ aśve mahiśatvasyaiveti virodho duṣparihara eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:431: jātyāder vastusaṃsthānatayā vastunaḥ prakāratvāt prakāraprakāriṇoś ca padārthāntaratvaṃ prakārasya pṛthaksiddhyanarhatvaṃ pṛthaganupalambhaś ca tasya ca saṃsthānasya cānekavastuṣu prakāratayāvasthitaś cetyādi pūrvam uktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:432: so 'yam iti buddhiḥ prakārāikyād ayam api daṇḍīti buddhimat /
GSP33ramvaspu:433: ayam ca jātyādiprakāro vastuno bheda ity ucyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:434: tadyoga eva vastuno bhinnam iti vyavahārahetur ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:435: sa ca vastuno bhedavyavahārahetuḥ svasya ca saṃvedanavat /
GSP33ramvaspu:436: yathā saṃvedanaṃ vastuno vyavahārahetuḥ svasya vyavahārahetuś ca bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:437: ata eva sanmātragrāhi pratyakṣaṃ na bhedagrāhītyādivādā nirastāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:438: jātyādisaṃsthānasaṃsthitasyaiva vastunaḥ pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītatvāt tasyaiva saṃsthānarūpajātyādeḥ pratiyogyapekṣayā bhedavyavahārahetutvāc ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:440: yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīm antaro yamayati eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:441: ya ātmani tiṣṭhann ātmano 'ntaro ya ātmā na veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ ya ātmānam antaro
GSP33ramvaspu:443: yaḥ pṛthivīm antare saṃcaran yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaṃ pṛthivī na vedetyādi yo 'kṣaram antare saṃcaran yasyākṣaraṃ śarīraṃ akṣaraṃ na veda yo mṛtyum antare saṃcaran yasya mṛtyuḥ śarīraṃ yaṃ mṛtyur na veda eṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmāpahatapāpmā divyo deva
GSP33ramvaspu:445: dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣaṃ pariṣasvajāte /
GSP33ramvaspu:446: tayor anyaḥ pippalaṃ svādv atty anaśnann anyo 'bhicākaśīti /
GSP33ramvaspu:449: tadanupraviśya sac ca tyac cānṛtaṃ ca satyam abhavat /
GSP33ramvaspu:451: pṛthagātmānaṃ preritāraṃ matvā jaṣṭas tatas tenāmṛtatvam eti /
GSP33ramvaspu:452: bhoktā bhogyaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā sarvaṃ proktaṃ trividhaṃ brahma, etat /
GSP33ramvaspu:453: nityo nityānāṃ cetanaś cetanānām eko bahūnāṃ yo vidadhāti kāmān /
GSP33ramvaspu:455: jñājñau dvav ajav īśānīśav ityādiśrutiśatais tadupabṛṃhaṇaiḥ jagat sarvaṃ śarīraṃ te sthairyaṃ te vasudhātalam //
GSP33ramvaspu:456: yat kiṃcit sṛjyate yena sattvajātena vai dvija /
GSP33ramvaspu:457: tasya sṛjyasya saṃbhūtau tatsarvaṃ vai hares tanuḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:459: sarvasya cāhaṃ hṛdi saṃniviṣṭo mattaḥ smṛtir jñānam apohanaṃ ca //
GSP33ramvaspu:460: ityādivedavidagresaravālmīkiparāśaradvaipāyanavacobhiś ca parasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvasyātmatvāvagamāc cidacidātmakasya vastunas taccharīratvāvagamāc ca śarīrasya śarīriṇaṃ prati prakāratayaiva padārthatvāc śarīraśarīriṇoś ca dharmabhede 'pi tayor asaṃkarāt sarvaśarīraṃ brahmeti brahmaṇo vaibhavaṃ pratipādayadbhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyādibhir mukhyavṛttaiḥ sarvacetanācetanaprakāraṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:464: tathā hi tat tvam iti sāmānādhikaraṇye tad ityanena jagatkāraṇaṃ sarvakalyāṇaguṇagaṇākaraṃ niravadyaṃ brahmocyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:465: tvam iti ca cetanasāmānādhikaraṇyavṛttena jīvāntaryānirūpi taccharīraṃ tadātmatayāvasthitaṃ tatprakāraṃ brahmocyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:466: itareṣu pakṣeṣu sāmānādhikaraṇyahānir brahmaṇaḥ sadeṣatā ca syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:468: brahmaivam avasthitam ity atraivaṃśabdārthabhūtaprakāratayaiva vicitracetanācetanātmakaprapañcasya sthūlasya sūkṣmasya ca sadbhāvaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:469: tathā ca bahu syāṃ prajāyeyety ayam arthaḥ saṃpanno bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:470: tasyaiveśvarasya kāryatayā kāraṇatayā ca nānāsaṃsthānasaṃsthitasya saṃsthānatayā cidacidvastujātam avasthitam iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:471: nanu ca saṃsthānarūpeṇa prakāratayaivaṃśabdārthatvam jātiguṇayor eva dṛṣṭaṃ na dravyasya /
GSP33ramvaspu:473: ucyate dravyasyāpi daṇḍakuṇḍalāder dravyāntaraprakāratvaṃ dṛṣṭam eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:474: nanu ca daṇḍādeḥ svatantrasya dravyāntaraprakāratve matvarthīyapratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:476: ato gotvāditulyatayā cetanācetanasya dravyabhūtasya vastuna īśvaraprakāratayā sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratipādanaṃ na yujyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:477: atrocyate gaur aśvo manuṣyo deva iti bhūtasaṃghātarūpāṇāṃ dravyāṇām eva devadatto manuṣyo jātaḥ puṇyaviśeṣeṇa yajñadatto gaurjātaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:478: pāpena, anyaś cetanaḥ puṇyātirekeṇa devo jāta ityādidevādiśarīrāṇāṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:480: ayam arthaḥ jātir vā guṇo vā dravyaṃ vā na tatrādaraḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:481: kaṃcana dravyaviśeṣaṃ prati viśeṣaṇatayaiva yasya sadbhāvas tasya tadapṛthaksiddhes tatprakāratayā tatsāmānādhikaraṇyena pratipādanaṃ yuktam
GSP33ramvaspu:482: / yasya punar dravyasya pṛthaksiddhasyaiva kadācitkvaciddravyāntaraprakāratvam iṣyate tatra matvarthīyapratyaya iti
GSP33ramvaspu:484: evam eva sthāvarajaṅgamātmakasya sarvasya vastuna īśvaraśarīratvena tatprakāratayaiva svarūpasadbhāva iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:485: tatprakārīśvara eva tattacchabdenābhidhīyata iti tatsāmānādhikaraṇyena pratipādanaṃ yuktaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:486: / tad evaitat sarvaṃ pūrvam eva nāmarūpavyākaraṇaśrutivivaraṇe prapañcitam
GSP33ramvaspu:487: ataḥ prakṛtipuruṣamahadahaṃkāratanmātrabhūtendriyatadārabdhacaturdaśabhuvanātmakabrahmāṇḍatadantarvartidevatiryaṅmanuṣyasthāvarādisarvaprakārasaṃsthānasaṃsthitaṃ kāryam api sarvaṃ brahmaiveti kāraṇabhūtabrahmavijñānād eva sarvaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavatīty ekavijñānena sarvavijñānam upapannataram /
GSP33ramvaspu:488: tad evaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvādimukhena kṛtsnasya cidacidvastunaḥ parabrahmaprakāratayā tadātmakatvam uktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:489: nanu ca parasya brahmaṇaḥ svarūpeṇa pariṇāmāspadatvaṃ nirvikāratvaniravadyatvaśrutivyākopaprasañgena nivāritam /
GSP33ramvaspu:490: prakṛtiś ca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhād ity ekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñānamṛttatkāryadṛṣṭāntābhyāṃ paramapuruṣasya jagadupādānakāraṇatvaṃ ca pratipāditam /
GSP33ramvaspu:494: tatreśvarasya jīvarūpapariṇāmābhyupagamena nātmā śruter nityatvāc ca tābhya iti virudhyate
GSP33ramvaspu:495: vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyaparihāraś ca jīvanam anāditvābhyupagamena tatkarmanimittatayā pratipāditaḥ vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvān na karmavibhāgād iti cen na anāditvād upapadyate cāpy upalabhyate cetyakṛtābhyāgamakṛtavipraṇāśaprasaṅgaś cānityatve 'bhihitaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:496: tathā prakṛter apy anāditā śrutibhiḥ pratipaditā ajām ekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ bahnīṃ prajāṃ janayantīṃ sarūpām /
GSP33ramvaspu:497: ajo hy eko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahāty enāṃ bhuktabhogām ajo 'nyaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:499: asmān māyī sṛjate viśvam etat tasmiṃś cānyo māyayā saṃniruddhaḥ māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyān māyinaṃ tu maheśvaram iti prakṛtir eva svarūpeṇa vikārāspadam iti ca darśayati /
GSP33ramvaspu:500: gaur anādyantavatī sā janitrī bhūtabhāvinīti ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:501: smṛtiś ca bhavati prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva viddhy anādī ubhav api /
GSP33ramvaspu:502: vikārāṃś ca guṇāṃś caiva viddhi prakṛtisaṃbhavān //
GSP33ramvaspu:503: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:504: ahaṃkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā //
GSP33ramvaspu:505: apareyam itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām /
GSP33ramvaspu:507: prakṛtiṃ svām avaṣṭabhya visṛjāmi punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:515: tad āha vyaktaṃ viṣṇus tathāvyaktaṃ puruṣaḥ kāla eva ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:516: sā eva kṣobhako brahman kṣobhyaś ca parameśvaraḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:518: ataḥ prakṛtiprakārasaṃsthite paramātmani prakārabhūtaprakṛtyaṃse vikāraḥ prakāryaṃse cāvikāraḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:519: evam eva jīvaprakārasaṃsthite paramātmani ca prakārabhūtajīvāṃśe sarve cāpuruṣārthāḥ prakāryaṃśo niyantā niravadyaḥ sarvakalyāṇaguṇākaraḥ satyasaṃkalpa eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:520: tathā ca sati kāraṇāvastha īśvara eveti tadupādānakajagatkāryāvastho 'pi
GSP33ramvaspu:521: sa eveti kāryakāraṇayor ananyatvaṃ sarvaśrutyavirodhaś ca bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:523: kāraṇāvasthaṃ, jagatas tadāpattir eva ca pralayaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:525: brahmaṇas tathāvidhasthūlabhāva eva jagataḥ sṛṣṭir ity ucyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:526: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā parāśareṇa pradhānapuṃsor ajayoḥ kāraṇaṃ kāryabhūtayoḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:528: tasmād īśvaraprakārabhūtasarvāvasthaprakṛtipuruṣavācinaḥ śabdās tatprakāraviśiṣṭatayāvasthite paramātmani mukhyatayā vartante /
GSP33ramvaspu:530: yathā devamanuṣyādiśabdā devamanuṣyādiprakṛtipariṇāmaviśeṣāṇāṃ jīvātmaprakāratayaiva padārthatvāt prakāriṇi jīvātmani mukhyatayā vartante /
GSP33ramvaspu:531: tasmāt sarvasya cidacidvastunaḥ paramātmaśarīratayā tatprakāratvāt paramātmani mukhyatayā vartante sarve vācakāḥ śabdāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:532: ayam eva cātmaśarīrabhāvaḥ pṛthaksiddhyanarhādhārādheyabhāvo niyantṛniyāmyabhāvaḥ śeṣaśeṣibhāvaś ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:533: sarvātmanādhāratayā niyantṛtayā śeṣitayā ca āpnotīty ātmā sarvātmanādheyatayā niyāmyatayā śeṣatayā ca apṛthaksiddhaṃ prakārabhūtam ity ākāraḥ śarīram iti cocyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:536: tad āha śrutigaṇaḥ sarve vedā yatpadam āmananti sarve vedā yatraikaṃ bhavantīti /
GSP33ramvaspu:538: eko devo bahudhā niviṣṭaḥ, sahaiva santaṃ na vijānanti devā ityādi /
GSP33ramvaspu:540: devamanuṣyādīnām antaryāmitayātmatvena niviśya sahaiva santaṃ teṣām indriyāṇi manaḥparyantāni na vijānantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:541: tathā ca paurāṇikāni vacāṃsi natāḥ sma sarvavacasāṃ pratiṣṭhā yatra śaśvatī /
GSP33ramvaspu:543: kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇāṃ pūrvaṃ vacasāṃ vācyam uttamam /
GSP33ramvaspu:544: vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:545: ityādīni sarvāṇi hi vacāṃsi saśarīrātmaviśiṣṭam antaryāmiṇam evācakṣate /
GSP33ramvaspu:546: hantāham imās tisro devatā anena jīvenātmānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇīti hi śrutiḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:547: tathā ca mānavaṃ vacaḥ praśāsitāraṃ sarveṣām aṇīyāṃsam aṇīyasām rukmābhaṃ svapnadhīgamyaṃ vidyāt taṃ puruṣaṃ param //
GSP33ramvaspu:548: antaḥ praviśyāntaryāmitayā sarveṣāṃ praśāsitāraṃ niyantāram aṇīyāṃsa ātmānaḥ kṛtsnasyācetanasya vyāpakatayā sūkṣmabhūtās te teṣām api vyāpakatvāt tebhyo 'pi sūkṣmatara ityarthaḥ rukmābhaḥ ādityavarṇaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:550: enam eke vadanty agniṃ māruto 'nye prajāpatim /
GSP33ramvaspu:551: indram eke pare pramāṇam apare brahma śāśvatam //
GSP33ramvaspu:554: uktarītyā parasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ sarvasya praśāsitṛtvena sarvāntarātmatayā praviśyāvasthitatvād agnyādayaḥ śabdā api śāśvatabrahmaśabdavat tasyaiva vācakā bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:555: tathā ca smṛtyantaram ye yajanti pitQn devān brāhmaṇān sahutāśanān /
GSP33ramvaspu:558: pitṛdevabrāhmaṇahutāśanādiśabdās tanmukhena tadantarātmabhūtasya viṣṇor eva vācakā ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:559: atredaṃ sarvaśāstrahṛdayam jīvātmānaḥ svayam asaṃkucitāparicchinnanirmalajñānasvarūpāḥ santaḥ karmarūpāvidyāveṣṭitās tattatkarmānurūpajñānasaṃkocam āpannāḥ,
GSP33ramvaspu:560: brahmādistambaparyantavividhavicitradeheṣu praviśṭās tattaddehocitalabdhajñānaprasarās tattaddehātmābhimāninas taducitakarmāṇi kurvāṇās tadanuguṇasukhaduḥkhopabhogarūpasaṃsārapravāhaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:561: eteṣāṃ saṃsāramocanaṃ bhagavatprapattim antareṇa nopapadyata iti tadarthaḥ prathamam eṣāṃ devādibhedarahitajñānaikākāratayā sarveṣāṃ sāmyaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:563: bhagavadātmakatām api pratipādya, bhagavatsvarūpaṃ ca heyapratyanīlakalyāṇaikatānatayā sakaletaravisajātīyam anavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇāśrayaṃ svasaṃkalpapravṛttasamastacidacidvastujātatayā sarvasyātmabhūtaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:564: pratipādya, tadupāsana sāṅgaṃ tatprāpakaṃ pratipadayanti śāstrāṇīti /
GSP33ramvaspu:566: duḥkhājñānamalā dharmā prakṛtes te na cātmanaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:570: śuni caiva śvapāke ca pāṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:573: tattat prakṛtiviśeṣaviyuktātmayāthātmyajñānavantas tatra tatrātyantaviṣamākāre vartamānam ātmānaṃ samānākāraṃ paśyantīti samadarśina ity uktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:574: tad idam āha ihaiva tair jitaḥ sargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:575: nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma tasmād brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:577: nirdoṣaṃ devādiprakṛtiviśeṣasaṃsargarūpadoṣarahitaṃ svarūpeṇāvasthitaṃ sarvam ātmavastu nirvāṇarūpajñānaikākāratayā samam ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:578: tasyaivaṃbhūtasyātmano bhagavaccheṣataikarasatā tanniyāmyatā tadekādhāratā ca taccharīratattanuprabhṛtibhiḥ śabdais tatsamānādhikaraṇyena ca śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣu pratipādyata iti pūrvam evoktam daivī hy eṣā guṇamayī mama māyā duratyayā /
GSP33ramvaspu:579: mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te //
GSP33ramvaspu:580: iti tasyātmanaḥ karmakṛtavicitraguṇamayaprakṛtisaṃsargarūpāt saṃsārān mokṣo bhagavatprapattim antareṇa nopapadayata ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:581: nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyata ityādiśrutibhiś ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:582: mayā tatam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad avyaktamūrtinā /
GSP33ramvaspu:583: matsthāni sarvabhūtāni na cāhaṃ teṣu avasthitaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:584: na ca matsthāni bhūtāni paśya me yogam aiśvaram //
GSP33ramvaspu:586: tad āha viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat /
GSP33ramvaspu:587: iti anantavicitramahāścaryarūpaṃ jagan mamāyutāṃśenātmatayā praviśya sarvaṃ matsaṃkalpena viṣṭabhyānena rūpeṇānantamahāvibhūtiparimitodāraguṇasāgaro niratiśayāścaryabhūtaḥ sthito
GSP33ramvaspu:589: tad idam āha ekatve sati nānātvaṃ nānātve sati caikatā /
GSP33ramvaspu:590: acintyaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ kutas tadveditum arhati //
GSP33ramvaspu:592: praśāsitṛtvenaika eva sanvicitracidacidvastuṣv antarātmatayā praviśya tattadrūpeṇa vicitraprakāro vicitrakarma kārayan nānārūpāṃ bhajate /
GSP33ramvaspu:593: evaṃ svalpāṃśena tu sarvāścaryaṃ nānārūpaṃ jagattadantarātmatayā praviśya viṣṭabhya nānātvenāvasthito 'pi sann anavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇaḥ sarveśvaraḥ parabrahmabhūtaḥ puruṣottamo nārāyaṇo niratiśayāścaryabhūto nīlatoyadasaṃkāśaḥ puṇḍarīkadalāmalāyatekṣaṇaḥ sahasrāṃśusahasrakiraṇaḥ parame vyomni yo veda
GSP33ramvaspu:594: nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyomaṃs tadakṣare parame vyomann ityādiśrutisiddha eka evātiṣṭhate
GSP33ramvaspu:595: brahmavyatiriktasya kasyacid api vastuna ekasvabhāvasyaikakāryaśaktiyuktasyaikarūpasya rūpāntarayogaḥ svabhāvāntarayogaḥ śaktyantarayogaś ca na ghaṭate /
GSP33ramvaspu:596: tasyaitasya parabrahmaṇaḥ sarvavastuvijātīyatayā sarvasvabhāvatvaṃ sarvaśaktiyogaś cety ekasyaiva vicitrānantarūpatā ca punar apy anantāparimitāścaryayogenaikarūpatā ca na viruddheti vastumātrasāmyād virodhacintā na yuktetyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:598: yato 'to brahmaṇas tās tu sargādyā bhāvaśaktayaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:600: etad uktaṃ bhavati sarveṣām agnijalādīnāṃ bhāvānām ekasminn api bhāve dṛṣṭaiva śaktis tadvijātīyabhāvāntare 'pīti na cintayituṃ yuktā jalādāv adṛṣṭāpi tadvijātīyapāvake bhāsvaratvoṣṇatādiśaktir yathā dṛśyate, evam eva sarvavastuvisajātīye brahmaṇi sarvasāmyaṃ nānumātuṃ yuktam iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:601: ato vicitrānantaśaktiyuktaṃ brahmaivetyarthaḥ tad āha jagad etan mahāścaryaṃ rūpaṃ yasya mahātmanaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:605: tathā hi pramāṇāntarāparidṛṣṭāparimitapariṇāmān ekatattvaniyatakramaviśiṣṭau sṛṣṭipralayau brahmaṇo 'nekavidhāḥ śrutayo vadanti niravadyaṃ nirañjanaṃ vijñānam ānandaṃ nirvikāraṃ niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntaṃ nirguṇam ity ādikāḥ nirguṇaṃ jñānasvarūpaṃ brahmeti kāścana śrutayo 'bhidadhati /
GSP33ramvaspu:606: neha nānāsti kiṃcana mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati yatra tv asya sarvam ātmaivābhūt tat kena kaṃ paśyet tat kena kaṃ vijātīyād ityādikā nānātvaniṣedhavādinyaḥ santi kāścana śrutayaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:607: yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit yasya jñānamayaṃ tapaḥ sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadan yad āste sarve nimeṣā jajñire vidyutaḥ puruṣādadhi apahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijaghatso 'pipāsaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:608: satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpa iti sarvasmiñ jagati heyatayāvagataṃ sarvaguṇaṃ pratiṣidhya niratiśayakalyāṇaguṇānantyaṃ sarvajñatā sarvaśaktiyogaṃ sarvanāmarūpavyākaraṇaṃ sarvasyāvadhāratāṃ ca kāścana śrutayo bruvate sarvaṃ khalv idaṃ brahma tajjalān iti aitadātmyam idaṃ sarvaṃ ekaḥ san bahudhā vicāra ityādikā brahmasṛṣṭaṃ jagan nānākāraṃ pratipādya tadaikyaṃ ca pratipādayanti kāścana /
GSP33ramvaspu:609: pṛthagātmānaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā bhoktā bhogyaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā prajāpatir akāmayata prajāḥ sṛjeyeti patiṃ viśvasyātmeśvaraṃ śvāstaṃ śivam acyutaṃ tam īśvarāṇāṃ paraṃ maheśvaraṃ taṃ devatānāṃ paraṃ ca daivataṃ sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśāna ityādikā brahmaṇaḥ sarvasmād anyatvaṃ sarvasyeśitavyam īśvaratvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ sarvasya śeṣatāṃ patitvaṃ ceśvarasya kāścana /
GSP33ramvaspu:610: antaḥ praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānāṃ sarvātmā eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yasyāpaḥ śarīraṃ yasya tejaḥ śarīram ityādi yasyāvyaktaṃ śarīraṃ yasyākṣaraṃ śarīraṃ yasya mṛtyuḥ śarīraṃ yasyātmā śarīram iti brahmavyatiriktasya sarvasya vastuno brahmaṇaś ca śarīrātmabhāvaṃ darśayanti kāścaneti /
GSP33ramvaspu:611: nānārūpāṇāṃ vākyānām avirodho mukhyārthāparityāgaś ca yathā saṃbhavati tathā varṇanīyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:612: varṇitaṃ ca avikāraśrutayaḥ svarūpapariṇāmaparihārād eva mukhyārthāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:614: nānātvaniṣedhavādāś caikasya brahmaṇaḥ śarīratayā prakārabhūtaṃ sarvaṃ cetanācetanaṃ vastv iti sarvasyātmatayā sarvaprakāraṃ brahmaivāvasthitam iti surakṣitāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:616: jñānānandamātravādi ca sarvasmād anyasya sarvakalyāṇaguṇagaṇāśrayasya sarveśvarasya sarvaśeṣiṇaḥ sarvādhārasya sarvotpattisthitipralayahetubhūtasya niravadyasya nirvikārasya sarvātmabhūtasya parasya brahmaṇaḥ svarūpanirūpakadharmo malapratyanīkānandarūpajñānam eveti svaprakāśatayā svarūpam api jñānam eveti ca pratipādanād anupālitam /
GSP33ramvaspu:617: aikyavādāś ca śarīrātmabhāvena sāmānādhikaraṇyamukhyārthatopapādanād eva susthitāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:618: evaṃ ca saty abhedo vā bhedo vā dvyātmakatā vā vedāntavedyaḥ ko 'yam
GSP33ramvaspu:621: sarvaśarīratayā sarvaprakāraṃ brahmaivāvasthitam ity abhedaḥ samarthitaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:622: ekam eva brahma nānābhūtacidacidvastuprakāraṃ nānātvenāvasthitam iti bhedābhedau /
GSP33ramvaspu:623: acidvastunaś cidvastunaś ceśvarasya ca svarūpasvabhāvavailakṣaṇyād asaṃkarāc ca bhedaḥ samarthitaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:624: nanu ca tat tvam asi śvetaketo tasya tāvad eva ciram ity aikyajñānam eva paramapuruṣārthalakṣaṇamokṣasādhanam iti gamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:626: pṛthagātmānaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā juṣṭas tatas tenāmṛtatvam etīty ātmānaṃ preritāraṃ cāntaryāmiṇaṃ pṛthag matvā tataḥ pṛthaktvajñānād dhetos tena paramātmanā juṣṭo 'mṛtatvam etīti sākṣādamṛtatvaprāptisādhanam ātmano
GSP33ramvaspu:628: aikyavākyavirodhād etadaparamārthasaguṇabrahmaprāptiviṣayam ity abhyupagantavyam iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:629: pṛthaktvajñānasyaiva sākṣādamṛtatvaprāptisādhanatvaśravaṇād viparītaṃ kasmān na bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:631: dvayor tulyayor virodhe saty avirodhena tayor viṣayo vivecanīya iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:633: antaryāmirūpeṇāvasthitasya parasya brahmaṇaḥ śarīratayā prakāratvāj jīvātmanas tatprakāraṃ brahmaiva tvam iti śabdenābhidhīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:634: tathaiva jñātavyam iti tasya vākyasya viṣayaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:635: / evaṃbhūtāj jīvāt tadātmatayāvasthitasya paramātmano nikhiladoṣarahitatayā satyasaṃkalpatvād
GSP33ramvaspu:636: anavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇākaratvena ca yaḥ pṛthagbhāvaḥ so 'nusaṃdheya ity asya vākyasya viṣaya ity ayam arthaḥ pūrvam asakṛduktaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:637: bhoktā bhogyaṃ preritāraṃ ca matveti bhogyarūpasya vastuno 'cetanatvaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:638: paramārthatvaṃ satataṃ vikārāspadatvam ityādayaḥ svabhāvāḥ, bhoktur jīvātmanaś cāmalāparicchinnajñānānandasvabhāvasyaivānādikarmarūpāvidyākṛtanānāvidhajñānasaṃkocavikāsau bhogyabhūtācidvastusaṃsargaś ca paramātmopāsanān mokṣaś cetyādayaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:640: cāparimitaguṇaughāśrayatvenāvasthānam iti parasya brahmas trividhāvasthānaṃ jñātavyam ityarthaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:641: tat tvam asīti sadvidyāyām upāsyaṃ brahma saguṇaṃ saguṇabrahmaprāptiś ca phalam ity abhiyuktaiḥ pūrvācāryair vyākhyātam /
GSP33ramvaspu:643: vyākhyātaṃ ca dramiḍācāryeṇa vidyāvikalpaṃ vadatā yady api saccito na nirbhugnadaivataṃ guṇagaṇaṃ manasānudhāvet tathāpy antarguṇām eva devatāṃ bhajata iti tatrāpi saguṇaiva devatā prāpyata iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:645: na nirbhugnadaivataṃ guṇagaṇaṃ manasānudhāvet apahatapāpmatvādikalyāṇaguṇagaṇaṃ daivatād vibhaktaṃ yady api daharavidyāniṣṭha iva saccito na smaret /
GSP33ramvaspu:646: tathāpy antarguṇām eva devatāṃ bhajate devatāsvarūpānubandhitvāt sakalakalyāṇaguṇagaṇasya kenacid paradevatāsādhāraṇena nikhilajagatkāraṇatvādinā guṇenopāsyamānāpi devatā vastutaḥ svarūpānubandhi sarvakalyāṇaguṇagaṇaviśiṣṭaivopāsyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:647: ataḥ saguṇam eva brahma tatrāpi prāpyam iti sadvidyādaharavidyayor vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:648: nanu ca sarvasya jantoḥ paramātmāntaryāmī tanniyāmyaṃ ca sarvam evety uktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:649: evaṃ ca sati vidhiniṣedhaśāstrāṇām adhikārī na dṛśyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:650: yaḥ svabuddhyaiva pravṛttinivṛttiśaktaḥ sa evaṃ kuryān na kuryād iti vidhiniṣedhayogyaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:652: sarvasmin pravṛttijāte sarvasya prerakaḥ paramātmā kārayiteti tasya sarvaniyamanaṃ pratipāditam
GSP33ramvaspu:653: tathā ca śrūyate eṣa eva sādhu karma kārayati te yam ebhyo lokebhya unninīṣati /
GSP33ramvaspu:654: eṣa evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam adho ninīṣatīti /
GSP33ramvaspu:656: atrocyate sarveṣām eva cetanānāṃ cicchaktiyogaḥ pravṛttiśaktiyoga ityādi sarvaṃ pravṛttinivṛttiparikaraṃ sāmānyena saṃvidhāya tannirvahaṇāya tadādhāro bhūtvāntaḥ praviśyānumantṛtayā ca niyamanaṃ kurvañ śeṣitvenāvasthitaḥ paramātmaitadāhitaśaktiḥ sanpravṛttinivṛttyādi svayam eva kurute evaṃ kurvāṇam īkṣamāṇaḥ paramātmodāsīna āste /

GSP33ramvaspu:775: tasyaiva nārāyaṇasya paramakāraṇatā śaṃbhuśabdavācyatā ca paramakāraṇapratipādanaikapare nārāyaṇānuvāka eva pratipanneti tadvirodhyarthāntaraparikalpanaṃ kāraṇasyaiva dhyeyatvena vidhivākye na yujyate yad api tato yaduttaram ity atra puruṣād anyasya parataratvaṃ pratīyata ityabhyadhāyi tad api yasmāt paraṃ nāparam asti kiṃcid yasmān nāṇīyo na jyāyo 'sti kaścit yasmād aparaṃ yasmād anyat kiṃcid api paraṃ nāsti kenāpi prakāreṇa puruṣavyatiriktasya paratvaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /

GSP33ramvaspu:786: puruṣasyaiva śuddhiguṇayogena śivaśabdābhiprāyatvaṃ śāśvataṃ śivam acyutam ityādinā jñātam eva /

GSP33ramvaspu:809: yat punar idam āśaṅkitam atha yad idam asmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminn antarākāśas tasmin yad antas tad anveṣṭavyaṃ tad vā va vijijñāsitavyam ity atrākāśaśabdena jagadupādānakāraṇaṃ pratipādya tadantarvartinaḥ kasyacit tattvaviśeṣasyānveṣṭavyatā pratipādyate asyākāśasya nāmarūpayor nivoḍhṛtvaśravaṇāt puruṣasūkte puruṣasya nāmarūpayoḥ kartṛtvadarśanāc cākāśaparyāyabhūtāt puruṣād anyasyānveṣṭavyatayopāsyatvaṃ pratīyata ityanadhītavedānām adṛṣṭaśāstrāṇām idaṃ codyaṃ /
