GSP33ramvaspu:812: antarākāśaḥ kiṃ tad atra vidyate yad anveṣṭavyaṃ yad vā va vijijñāsitavyam iti codite yāvān vā ayam ākāśas tāvān eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśa ityādināsyākāśaśabdavācyasya paramapuruṣasyānavadhikamahattvaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:813: sakalajagadādhāratvaṃ ca pratipādya tasmin kāmāḥ samāhitā iti kāmaśabdenāpahatapāpmatvādisatyasaṃkalpaparyantaguṇāṣṭakaṃ nihitam iti paramapuruṣavat paramapuruṣaguṇāṣṭakasyāpi pṛthivijijñāsitavyatāpratipādayiṣayā tasmin yad antas tadanveṣṭavyam ityuktam iti śrutyaiva sarvaṃ parihṛtam /
GSP33ramvaspu:814: etad uktaṃ bhavati kiṃ tad atra vidyate yad aneṣṭavyam ity asya codyasya tasmin sarvasya jagataḥ sraṣṭṛtvam ādhāratvaṃ niyantṛtvaṃ śeṣitvam apahatapāpmatvādayo guṇāś ca vidyanta iti parihāra iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:815: tathā ca vākyakāravacanam tasmin yad antar iti kāmavyapadeśa iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:818: etad uktaṃ bhavati yad etad daharākāśaśabdābhidheyaṃ nikhilajagadudayavaibhavalayalīlaṃ paraṃ brahma tasmin yad antar nihitam anavadhikātiśayam apahatapāpmatvādiguṇāṣṭakaṃ tad ubhayam apy anveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyam iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:819: yathāha atha ya ihātmānam anuvidya vrajanty etāṃś ca satyān kāmāṃs teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavantīti /
GSP33ramvaspu:820: yaḥ punaḥ kāraṇasyaiva dhyeyatāpratipādanapare vākye viṣṇor ananyaparavākyapratipāditaparatattvabhūtasya kāryamadhye niveśaḥ sa svakāryabhūtatattvasaṃkhyāpūraṇaṃ kurvataḥ svalīlayā jagadupakārāya svecchāvatāra ity avagantavyaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:821: yathā līlayā devasaṃkhyāpūrṇaṃ kurvata upendratvaṃ parasyaiva, yathā ca sūryavaṃśodbhavarājasaṃkhyāpūrṇaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:822: kurvataḥ parasyaiva brahmaṇo dāśarathirūpeṇa svecchāvatāraḥ, yathā ca somavaṃśasaṃkhyāpūraṇaṃ kurvato bhagavato bhūbhārāvatāraṇāya svecchayā vasudevagṛhe 'vatāraḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:823: sṛṣṭipralayaprakaraṇeṣu nārāyaṇa eva paramakāraṇatayā pratipādyata iti pūrvam evoktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:824: yat punar atharvaśirasi rudreṇa svasarvāiśvaryaṃ prapañcitaṃ tat so 'ntarād antaraṃ prāviśad iti paramātmapraveśād uktam iti śrutyaiva vyaktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:825: śāstradṛṣṭyā tūpadeśo vāmadevavad iti sūtrakāreṇaivaṃvādinām arthaḥ pratipāditaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:826: yathoktaṃ prahlādenāpi sarvagatvād anantarasya sa evāham avasthitaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:827: mattaḥ sarvam ahaṃ sarvaṃ mayi sarvaṃ sanātane //
GSP33ramvaspu:830: svaśarīrabhūtasya sarvasya cidacidvastuna ātmatvena sarvagaḥ paramātmeti sarve śabdāḥ sarvaśarīraṃ paramātmānam evābhidadhatīty uktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:831: ato 'ham iti śabdaḥ svātmaprakāraprakāriṇaṃ paramātmānam evācaṣṭe /
GSP33ramvaspu:833: ātmety eva tu gṛhṇīyāt sarvasya tanniṣpatter ityādināhaṃgrahaṇopāsanaṃ vākyakāreṇa kāryāvasthaḥ kāraṇāvasthaś ca sthūlasūkṣmacidacidvastuśarīraḥ paramātmaiveti sarvasya tanniṣpatter ity uktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:834: ātmeti tūpagacchanti grāhayanti ceti sūtrakāreṇa ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:835: mahābhārate ca brahmarudrasaṃvāde brahmā rudraṃ prayāha tavāntarātmā mama ca ye cānye dehisaṃjñitāḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:837: rudrasya brahmaṇaś cānyeṣāṃ ca dehināṃ parameśvaro nārāyaṇo
GSP33ramvaspu:839: tathā tatraiva viṣṇur ātmā bhagavato bhavasyāmitatejasaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:842: tatraiva etau dvau vibudhaśreṣṭhau prasādakrodhajau smṛtau /
GSP33ramvaspu:846: nimittopādānayos tu bhedaṃ vadanto vedabāhyā eva syuḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:847: janmādyasya yataḥ prakṛtiś ca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhād ityādi vedavitpraṇītasūtravirodhāt sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam tad aikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti brahmavanaṃ brahma sa vṛkṣa āsīd yato dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣuḥ brahmādhyatiṣṭhadbhuvanāni dhārayan sarve nimeṣā jajñire vidyutaḥ puruṣādadhi na tasyeśe kaścana tasya nāma mahadyaśaḥ neha nānāsti kiṃcana sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśānaḥ puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yac ca bhavyam utāmṛtattvasyeśānaḥ nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyata ityādisarvaśrutivirodhāc ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:848: itihāsapurāṇeṣu ca sṛṣṭisthitipralayaprakaraṇayor idam eva paratattvam ity avagamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:849: yathā mahābhārate kutaḥ sṛṣṭam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagatsthāvarajaṅgamam /
GSP33ramvaspu:850: pralaye ca kam abhyeti tan to brūhi pitāmaha //
GSP33ramvaspu:851: iti pṛṣṭo nārāyaṇo jaganmūrtir anantātmā sanātana /
GSP33ramvaspu:852: ityādi ca vadati ṛṣayaḥ pitaro devā mahābhūtāni dhātavaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:855: prācyodīcyadākṣiṇātyapāścātyasarvaśiṣṭaiḥ sarvadharmasarvatattvavyavasthāyām idam eva paryāptam ity avigānaparigṛhītaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ ca purāṇaṃ janmādy asya yata iti jagajjanmādikāraṇaṃ brahmety avagamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:856: tajjanmādikāraṇaṃ kim iti praśnapūrvakaṃ viṣṇoḥ sakāśād bhūtam ityādinā brahmasvarūpaviśeṣapratipādanaikaparatayā pravṛttam iti sarvasaṃmatam /
GSP33ramvaspu:857: tathā tatraiva prakṛtir yā khyātā vyaktāvyaktasvarūpiṇī /
GSP33ramvaspu:858: puruṣaś ca+py ubhāv etau līyete paramātmani //
GSP33ramvaspu:860: viṣṇunāmā sa vedeṣu vedānteṣu ca gīyate //
GSP33ramvaspu:862: sarvavedavedānteṣu sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ paramakāraṇatayāyam eva gīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:863: yathā sarvāsu ṣrutiṣu kevalaparabrahmasvarūpaviśeṣapratipādanāyaiva pravṛtto nārāyaṇānuvākas tathedaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ ca purāṇam so 'ham icchāmi dharmajña śrotuṃ tvatto yathā jagat /
GSP33ramvaspu:864: babhūva bhūyaś ca yathā mahābhāga bhaviṣyati //
GSP33ramvaspu:866: līnam āsīd yathā yatra layam eṣyati yatra ca //
GSP33ramvaspu:867: iti paraṃ brahma kim iti prakramya viṣṇoḥ sakāśād udbhūtaṃ jagat tatraiva ca sthitam /
GSP33ramvaspu:872: varjitaḥ śakyate vaktuṃ yaḥ sad astīti kevalam //
GSP33ramvaspu:873: sarvatrāsau samastaṃ ca vasaty atreti vai yataḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:875: tadbrahma paraṃ nityam ajam akṣayam avyayam /
GSP33ramvaspu:876: ekasvarūpaṃ ca sadā heyābhāvāc ca nirmalam //
GSP33ramvaspu:879: sa sarvabhūtaprakṛtiṃ vikārān guṇādidoṣāṃś ca mune vyatītaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:884: paraḥ parāṇāṃ sakalā na yatra kleśādayaḥ santi parāvareśe //
GSP33ramvaspu:887: saṃjñāyate yena tad astadoṣaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ nirmalam ekarūpam /
GSP33ramvaspu:888: saṃdṛśyate vāpy adhigamyate vā tajjñānam ajñānam ato 'nyad uktam //
GSP33ramvaspu:894: sa saṃjñā yāti bhagavān eka janārdanaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:897: eka eva janārdana iti jana ardanasyaiva brahmaśivādikṛtsnaprapañcatādātmyaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:898: jagac ca sa iti pūrvoktam eva vivṛṇoti sraṣṭā sṛjati cātmānaṃ viṣṇuḥ pālyaṃ ca pāti ca
GSP33ramvaspu:900: iti ca sraṣṭṛtvenāvasthitaṃ brahmaṇaṃ sṛjyaṃ ca saṃhartāraṃ saṃhāryaṃ ca yugapan nirdiśya sarvasya viṣṇutādātmyopadeśāt sṛjyasaṃhāryabhūtād vastunaḥ sraṣṭṛsaṃhartror janārdanavibhūtitvena viśeṣo dṛśyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:902: ata eva svecchayā līlārthaṃ vibhūtyantarbhāva ucyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:903: yathedam anantaram evocyate pṛthivyāpas tathā tejo vāyur ākāśa eva ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:907: sa eva sṛjyaḥ sa ca sarvakartā sa eva pātyatti ca pālyate ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:908: brahmādyavasthābhir aśeṣamūrtir viṣṇur variṣṭho varado vareṇyaḥ // iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:909: atra sāmānādhikaraṇyanirdiṣṭaṃ heyamiśraprapañcatādātmyaṃ niravadyasya nirvikārasya samastakalyāṇaguṇātmakasya brahmaṇaḥ katham upapadyata ity āśaṅkhya sa eva sarvabhūtātmā viśvarūpo yato 'vyaya iti svayam evopapādayati /
GSP33ramvaspu:910: sa eva sarveśvaraḥ parabrahmabhūto viṣṇur eva sarvaṃ jagad iti pratijñāya sarvabhūtātmā viśvarūpo yato 'vyaya iti hetur uktaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:911: sarvabhūtānām ayam ātmā viśvaśarīro yato 'vyaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:912: vakṣyati ca satsarvaṃ vai hares tanur iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:914: asyāvyayasyāpi parasya brahmaṇo viṣṇor viśvaśarīratayā tādātmyaviruddham ity ātmaśarīrayoś ca svabhāvā vyavasthitā eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:915: evaṃbhūtasya sarveśvarasya viṣṇoḥ prapañcāntarbhūtaniyāmyakoṭiniviṣṭabrahmādidevatiryaṅmanuṣyeṣu tat tat samāśrayaṇīyatvāya svecchāvatāraḥ pūrvoktaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:916: tad etad brahmādīnāṃ bhāvanātrayānvayena karmavaśyatvaṃ bhagavataḥ parabrahmabhūtasya vāsudevasya nikhilajagadupakārāya svecchayā svenaiva rūpeṇa devādiṣv avatāra iti ca ṣaṣṭe 'ṃśe śubhāśrayaprakaraṇe suvyaktam uktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:917: asya devādirūpeṇāvatāreṣv api na prākṛto deha iti mahābhārate na bhūtasaṃghasaṃsthāno deho 'sya paramātmanaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:919: śrutibhiś ca ajāyamāno bahudhā vijāyate tasya dhīrāḥ parijānanti yonim iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:921: ayaṃ tu sarveśvaraḥ satyasaṃkalpo bhagavān evaṃbhūtaśubhetarajanmākurvann api svecchayā svenaiva niratiśayakalyāṇarūpeṇa devādiṣu jagadupakārāya bahudhā jāyate,
GSP33ramvaspu:924: tadetannikhilajagannimittopādānabhūtāj janmādy asya yataḥ prakṛtiś ca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhādityādisūtraiḥ pratipāditāt parasmād brahmaṇaḥ paramapuruṣād anyasya kasyacit parataratvaṃ paramataḥ setūn mānasaṃbandhabhedavyapadeśebhya ityāśaṅkya sāmānyāt tu buddhyarthaḥ pādavat sthānaviśeṣāt prakāśādivat upapatteś ca tathānyapratiṣedhāt anena sarvagatatvamāyām ādiśabdādibhya iti sūtrakāraḥ svayam eva nirākaroti /
GSP33ramvaspu:925: mānave ca śāstre prādurāsīt tamonudaḥ sisṛkṣur vividhāḥ prajāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:926: apa eva sasarjādau tāsu vīryam apāsṛjat //
GSP33ramvaspu:927: tasmiñ jajñe svayaṃ brahma iti brahmaṇo janmaśravaṇāt kṣetrajñatvam evāvagamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:928: tathā ca sraṣṭuḥ paramapuruṣasya tadvisṛṣṭasya ca brahmaṇaḥ ayaṃ tasya tāḥ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:929: tadvisṛṣṭaḥ sa puruṣo loke brahmeti kīrtyate //
GSP33ramvaspu:931: tathā ca vaiṣṇave purāṇe hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ bhāvanātrayānvayād aśuddhatvena śubhāśrayatvānarhatopapādanāt kṣetrajñatvaṃ niścīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:932: yad api kaiścid uktam sarvasya śabdajātasya vidhyarthavādamantrarūpasya kāryābhidhāyitvenaiva prāmāṇyaṃ varṇanīyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:933: vyavahārād anyatra śabdasya bodhakatvaśaktyavadhāraṇāsaṃbhavād vyavahārasya ca kāryabuddhimūlatvāt kāryarūpa eva śabdārthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:934: na pariniṣpanne vastuni śabdaḥ pramāṇam iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:936: pravartakavākyavyavahāra eva śabdānām arthabodhakatvaśaktyavadhāraṇaṃ kartavyam iti kim iyaṃ rājājñā /
GSP33ramvaspu:938: tathā hi kenacid dhastaceṣṭādināpavarake daṇḍaḥ sthita iti devadattāya jñāpayeti preṣitaḥ kaścit tajjñāpane pravṛtto 'pavarake daṇḍaḥ sthita iti śabdaṃ prayuṅkte /
GSP33ramvaspu:939: mūkavad dhastaceṣṭām imāṃ jānan pārśvastho 'nyaḥ prāgvyutpanno
GSP33ramvaspu:940: 'pi tasyārthasya bodhanāyāpavarake daṇḍaḥ sthita ityasya śabdasya
GSP33ramvaspu:941: prayogadarśanād asyārthasyāyaṃ śabdo bodhaka iti jānātīti kim atra duṣkaram /
GSP33ramvaspu:942: tathā bālas tāto 'yam iyaṃ mātāyaṃ mātulo 'yaṃ manuṣyo 'yaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:943: mṛgaś candro 'yam ayaṃ ca sarpa iti mātāpitṛprabhṛtibhiḥ śabdaiḥ śanaiḥ śanair aṅgulyā nirdeśane tatra tatra bahuśaḥ śikṣitas tair eva śabdais teṣv artheṣu svātmanaś ca buddhyutpattiṃ dṛṣṭvā teṣv artheṣu teṣāṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:944: śabdānām aṅgulyā nirdeśapūrvakaḥ prayogaḥ sambandhāntarābhāvāt saṃketayitṛpuruṣājñānāc ca bodhakatvanibandhana iti krameṇa niścitya punar apy asya śabdasyāyam artha iti pūrvavṛddhaiḥ śikṣitaḥ sarvaśabdānām artham avagamya svayam api sarvaṃ vākyajātaṃ prayuṅkte /
GSP33ramvaspu:945: evam eva sarvapadānāṃ svārthābhidhāyitvaṃ saṃghātaviśeṣaṇāṃ ca yathāvasthitasaṃsargaviśeṣavācitvaṃ ca jānātīti kāryārthaiva vyuttipattir ityādinirbandho nirbandhanaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:946: ataḥ pariṣpannaḥ vastuni śabdasyabodhakatvaśaktyavadhāraṇāt sarvāṇi vedāntavākyāni sakalajagatkāraṇaṃ sarvakalyāṇaguṇākaramuktalakṣaṇaṃ brahma bodhayanty eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:947: api ca kāryārtha eva vyutpattir astu /
GSP33ramvaspu:948: vedāndavākyāny apy upāsanaviṣayakāryādhikṛtaviśeṣaṇabhūtaphalatvena duḥkhāsaṃbhinnadeśaviśeṣarūpasvargādivad rātrisatrapratiṣṭhānādivad apagoraṇaśatayātanāsādhyasādhanabhāvavac ca karyopayogitayaiva sarvaṃ bodhayanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:950: śrūyate paraprāptikāmo brahma vidyād ityatra prāpyatayā pratīyamānaṃ brahmasvarūpaṃ tadviśeṣaṇaṃ ca sarvaṃ kāryopayogitayaiva siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:951: tadantargatam eva jagatsraṣṭṛtvaṃ saṃhartṛtvam ādhāratvam antarātmatvam ityādy uktam anuktaṃ ca sarvam iti na kiṃcid anupapannam /
GSP33ramvaspu:952: evaṃ ca sati mantrārthavādagatā hy aviruddhā apūrvāś cārthāḥ sarve vidhiśeṣatayaiva siddhā bhavanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:953: yathoktaṃ dramiḍabhāṣye ṛṇaṃ hi vai jāyata iti śruter ity upakramya yady apy avadānastutiparaṃ vākyaṃ tathāpi nāsatā stutir upapadyata iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:954: etad uktaṃ bhavati sarvo hy arthavādabhāgo devatārādhanabhūtayāgādeḥ sāṅgasyārādhyadevatāyāś cādṛṣṭarūpān guṇān sahasraśo vadan sahasraśaḥ karmaṇi prāśastyabuddhim utpādayati /
GSP33ramvaspu:955: teṣām asadbhāve prāśastyabuddhir eva na syād iti karmaṇi prāśastyabuddhyarthaṃ guṇasadbhāvam eva bodhayatīti /
GSP33ramvaspu:956: anayaiva diśā sarve mantrārthavādāvagatā arthāḥ siddhāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:957: api ca kāryavākyārthavādibhiḥ kim idaṃ kāryatvaṃ nāmeti vaktavyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:960: yad adhikṛtya kṛtir vartate tat kṛtyuddeśyatvam iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:962: yatprāptīcchayā kṛtim utpādayati puruṣaḥ tat kṛtyuddeśyatvam iti ced dhanta tarhīṣṭatvam eva kṛtyuddeśyatvam /
GSP33ramvaspu:967: tathā hīcchāviṣayatayā pratītasya svaprayatnotpattim antareṇāsiddhir eva prerakatvam /
GSP33ramvaspu:969: icchāyāṃ jātāyām iṣṭasya svaprayatnotpattim antareṇāsiddhiḥ pratīyate cet tataś cikīrṣā jāyate tataḥ pravartate puruṣa iti tattvavidāṃ prakriyā /
GSP33ramvaspu:970: tasmād iṣṭasya kṛtyadhīnātmalābhatvātireki kṛtyuddeśyatvaṃ nāma kim pi na dṛṣyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:976: ataḥ sukhavyatiriktasya kasyāpi puruṣānukūlatvaṃ na saṃbhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:977: nanu ca duḥkhanivṛtter api sukhavyatiriktāyāḥ puruṣānukūlatā dṛṣṭā /
GSP33ramvaspu:979: ātmānukūlaṃ sukham ātmapratikūlaṃ duḥkham iti hi sukhaduḥkhayor vivekaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:984: tathā hi prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭasya saṃsāriṇaḥ puruṣasyānukūlasaṃyogaḥ pratikūlasaṃyogaḥ svarūpeṇāvasthitir iti ca tisro
GSP33ramvaspu:986: tatra pratikūlasaṃbandhanivṛttiś cānukūlasaṃbandhanivṛttiś ca svarūpeṇāvasthitir eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:987: tasmāt pratikūlasaṃyoge vartamāne tannivṛttirūpā svarūpeṇāvasthitir apīṣṭā bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:989: ataḥ sukharūpatvād anukūlatāyāḥ niyogasyānukūlatāṃ vadantaṃ prāmāṇikāḥ parihasanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:990: iṣṭasyārthaviśeṣasya nivartakatayaiva hi niyogasya niyogatvaṃ sthiratvam apūrvatvaṃ ca pratīyate
GSP33ramvaspu:991: svargakāmo yajetety atra kāryasya kriyātiriktā svargakāmapadasamabhivyāhāreṇa svargasādhanatvaniścayād eva bhavanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:992: na ca vācyaṃ yajetety atra prathamaṃ niyogaḥ svapradhānatayaiva pratīyate svargakāmapadasamabhivyāhārāt svasiddhaye svargasiddhyanukūlatā ca niyogasyeti /
GSP33ramvaspu:994: svargakāmapadasamabhivyāhārād eva dhātvarthātirekiṇo niyogatvaṃ sthiratvam apūrvatvaṃ cetyādi
GSP33ramvaspu:996: samabhivyāhṛtasvargakāmapadārthānvayayogyaṃ svargasādhanam eva kāryaṃ liṅādayo 'bhidadhatīti lokavyutpattir api tiraskṛtā /
GSP33ramvaspu:997: etad uktaṃ bhavati samabhivyahṛtapadāntaravācyārthānvayayogyam evetarapadapratipādyam ityanvitābhidhāyipadasaṃghātarūpavākyaśravaṇasaman antaram eva pratīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:999: ataḥ kriyāvad ananyārthatāpi virodhād eva parityakteti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1000: ata eva gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau ghoṣaprativāsayogyārthopasthāpanaparatvaṃ gaṅgāpadasyāśrīyate
GSP33ramvaspu:1001: prathamaṃ gaṅgāpadena gaṅgārthaḥ smṛta iti gaṅgāpadārthasya peyatvaṃ na vākyārthānvayībhavati
GSP33ramvaspu:1002: evam atra api yajetetyetāvanmātraśravaṇe kāryam ananyārthaṃ smṛtam iti vākyārthānvayasamaye kāryasyānanyārthatā nāvatiṣṭhate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1003: kāryābhidhāyipadaśravaṇavelāyāṃ prathamaṃ kāryam ananyārthaṃ pratītam ity etad api na saṃgacchate
GSP33ramvaspu:1004: vyutpattikāle gavānayanādikriyāyā duḥkharūpāyā iṣṭaviśeṣasādhanatayaiva kāryatāpratīteḥ ato niyogasya puruṣānukūlatvaṃ sarvalokaviruddhaṃ niyogasya sukharūpapuruṣānukūlatāṃ vadataḥ svānubhavavirodhaś ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1005: karīryā vṛṣṭikāmo yajeytetyādiṣu siddhe 'pi niyoge vṛṣṭyādisiddhinimittasya vṛṣṭivyatirekeṇa
GSP33ramvaspu:1007: yady apy asmiñ janmani vṛṣṭyādisiddher aniyamas tathāpy aniyamād eva niyogasiddhir avaśyāśrayaṇīyā
GSP33ramvaspu:1009: evam uktarītyā kṛtisādhyeṣṭatvātireki kṛtyuddeśyatvaṃ na dṛśyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1010: kṛtiṃ prati śeṣitvaṃ kṛtyuddeśyatvam iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:1011: kim idaṃ śeṣitvaṃ kiṃ ca śeṣatvam iti vaktavyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1014: evaṃ tarhi kāryatvam eva śeṣitvam ity uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1021: kṛtiprayojanatvam iti cet puruṣasya kṛtyārambhaprayojanam eva hi kṛtiprayojanam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1022: sa cecchāviṣayaḥ kṛtyadhīnātmalābha iti pūrvokta eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:1024: paragatātiśayādhānecchopādeyatvam eva yasya svarūpaṃ sa śeṣaḥ paraḥ śeṣī /
GSP33ramvaspu:1025: phalotpattīcchayā yāgādes tatprayatnasya copādeyatvaṃ yāgādisiddhīcchayānyat sarvam upādeyam
GSP33ramvaspu:1026: evaṃ garbhadāsādīnām api puruṣaviśeṣātiśayādhānopādeyatvam eva svarūpam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1027: evam īśvaragatātiśayādhānecchayopādeyatvam eva cetanācetanātmakasya nityasyānityasya ca sarvasya vastunaḥ svarūpam iti sarvam īśvaraśeṣatvam eva sarvasya ceśvaraḥ śeṣīti sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśānaḥ patiṃ viśvasyetyādyuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1028: kṛtisādhyaṃ pradhānaṃ yat tatkāryam abhidhīyata ity ayam arthaḥ śraddadhāneṣv eva śobhate
GSP33ramvaspu:1029: api ca svargakāmo yajetetyādiṣu lakāravācyakartṛviśeṣasamarpaṇaparāṇāṃ svargakāmādipadānāṃ niyojyaviśeṣasamarpaṇaparatvaṃ śabdānuśāsanaviruddhaṃ kenāvagamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1030: sādhyasvargaviśiṣṭasya svargasādhane kartṛtvānvayo na ghaṭata iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:1031: niyojyatvānvayo 'pi na ghaṭata iti hi svargasādhanatvaniścayaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1032: sa tu śāstrasiddhe kartṛtvānvaye svargasādhanatvaniścayaḥ kriyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1033: yathā bhoktukāmo devadattagṛhaṃ gacched ityukte bhojanakāmasya devadattagṛhagamane kartṛtvaśravaṇād eva prāgajñātam api bhojanasādhanatvaṃ devadattagṛhagamanasyāvagamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1035: na kriyāntaraṃ prati kartṛtayā śrutasya kriyāntare kartṛtvakalpanaṃ yuktam yajeteti hi yāgakartṛtayā śrutasya biddhau kartṛtvakalpanaṃ kriyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1037: yathoktaṃ niyojya sarvakāryaṃ yaḥ svakīyatvena budhyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1040: devadattaḥ paced iti pāke kartṛtayā śrutasya devadattasya pākārthagamanaṃ pākānuguṇam iti gamane kartṛtvakalpanaṃ na yujyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1041: kiṃ ca liṅādiśabdavācyaṃ sthāyirūpaṃ kim ity apūrvam āśrīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1045: tasya svargakāmasya kālāntarabhāvisvargasiddhau kṣaṇabhaṅginī yāgādikriyā na samartheti cet
GSP33ramvaspu:1047: sarvaiḥ karmabhir ārādhitaḥ parameśvaro bhagavān nārāyaṇas tattadiṣṭaṃ phalaṃ dadātīti vedavido vadanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1048: yathāhur vedavidagresarā dramiḍācāryāḥ phalasaṃbibhatsayā hi karmabhir ātmānaṃ piprīṣanti sa prīto 'laṃ phalāyeti śāstramaryādā iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1049: phalasaṃbandhecchayā karmabhir yāgadānahomādibhir indriyādidevatāmukhena tattadantaryāmirūpeṇāvasthitam indrādiśabdavācyaṃ paramātmānaṃ bhagavantaṃ vāsudevam ārirādhayiṣanti, sa hi karmabhir ārādhitas teṣām iṣṭāni phalāni prayacchatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1050: tathā ca śrutiḥ iṣṭāpūrtaṃ bahudhā jātaṃ jāyamānaṃ viśvaṃ bibharti bhuvanasya nābhir iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1052: tadviśvaṃ bibharti indrāgnivaruṇādisarvadevatāsaṃbandhitayā pratīyamānaṃ tattadantarātmatayāvasthitaḥ paramapuruṣaḥ svayam eva bibharti svayam eva svīkaroti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1053: bhuvanasya nābhiḥ brahmakṣatrādisarvavarṇapūrṇasya bhuvanasya dhārakaḥ tais taiḥ karmabhir ārādhitas tattadiṣṭaphalapradānena bhuvanānāṃ dhāraka iti nābhir ityuktaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1054: agnivāyuprabhṛtidevatāntarātmatayā tattacchabdābhidheyo 'yam evety āha tad evāgnis tadvāyus tatsūryas tad u candramā iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1055: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā yo yo yām yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitum icchati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1056: tasya tasyācalāṃ śraddhāṃ tām eva vidadhāmy aham //
GSP33ramvaspu:1057: sa tasya śraddhayā yuktas tasyārādhanam īhate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1058: labhate ca tataḥ kāmān mayaiva vihitān iha tān // iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1059: yāṃ yāṃ tanum itīndrādidevatāviśeṣās tattadantaryāmitayāvasthitasya bhagavatas tanavaḥ śarīrāṇītyarthaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1060: ahaṃ hi sarvayajñānāṃ bhoktā ca prabhur eva ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1062: prabhur eva ceti sarvaphalānāṃ pradātā cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1063: yathā ca yajñais tvam ijyase nityaṃ sarvadevamayācyuta /
GSP33ramvaspu:1064: yaiḥ svadharmaparair nātha narair ādādhito bhavān /
GSP33ramvaspu:1065: te taranty akhilām etāṃ mayām ātmavimuktaye //
GSP33ramvaspu:1067: setihāsapurāṇeṣu sarveṣv eva vedeṣu sarvāṇi karmāṇi
GSP33ramvaspu:1068: sarveśvarārādhanarūpāṇi, tais taiḥ karmabhir ārādhitaḥ puruṣottamas tattadiṣṭaṃ phalaṃ dadātīti tatra tatra prapañcitam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1069: evam hi sarvaśaktiṃ sarvajñaṃ sarveśvaraṃ bhagavantam indrādidevatāntaryāmirūpeṇa yāgadānahomādivedoditasarvakarmaṇāṃ bhoktāraṃ sarvaphalānāṃ pradātāraṃ ca sarvāḥ śrutayo vadanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1070: caturhotāro yatra saṃpadaṃ gacchanti devair ityādyāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1072: antaryāmirūpeṇāvasthite, devaiḥ saṃpadaṃ gacchanti devaiḥ saṃbandhaṃ gacchanti yajñā ityarthaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1073: antaryāmirūpeṇāvasthitasya paramātmanaḥ śarīratayāvasthitānām indrādīnāṃ yāgādisaṃbandha ity uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1076: tasmād agnyādidevatāntarātmabhūtaparamapuruṣārādhanarūpabhūtāni sarvāṇi karmāṇi, sa eva cābhilaṣitaphalapradāteti kim atrāpūrveṇa vyutpattipathadūravartinā vācyatayābhyupagatena kalpitena vā prayojanam evaṃ ca sati liṅādeḥ ko 'yam arthaḥ parigṛhīto bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1077: yaja devapūjāyām iti devatārādhanabhūtayāgādeḥ prakṛtyarthasya kartṛvyāpārasādhyatāṃ vyutpattisiddhāṃ liṅādayo 'bhidadhatīti na kiṃcid anupapannam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1078: kartṛvācināṃ pratyayānāṃ prakṛtyarthasya kartṛvyāpārasaṃbandhaprakāro hi vācyaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1081: api ca kāminaḥ kartavyatā karma vidhāya karmaṇo devatārādhanarūpatāṃ taddvārā phalasaṃbhavaṃ ca tattatkarmavidhivākyāny eva vadanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1082: vāyavyaṃ śvetam ālabhata bhūtikāmo vāyur vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyum eva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayatītyādīni /
GSP33ramvaspu:1083: nātra phalasiddhyanupapattiḥ kāpi dṛśyata iti phalasādhanatvāvagatir aupādānikīty api na saṃgacchati
GSP33ramvaspu:1084: vidhyapekṣitaṃ yāgādeḥ phalasādhanatvaprakāraṃ vākyaśeṣa eva bodhayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1085: tasmād brāhmaṇāya nāpaguretety atrāpagoraṇaniṣedhavidhiparavākyaśeṣe śrūyamāṇaṃ niṣedhyasyāpagoraṇasya śatayātanāsādhanatvaṃ niṣedhavidhyupayogīti hi svīkriyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1086: atra punaḥ kāminaḥ kartavyatayā vihitasya yāgādeḥ kāmyasvargādisādhanatvaprakāraṃ vākyaśeṣāvagatam anādṛtya kim ity upādānena yāgādeḥ phalasādhanatvaṃ parikalpyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1087: hiraṇyanidhim apavarake nidhāya yācate kodravādilubdhaḥ kṛpaṇaṃ janam iti śrūyate tad etad yuṣmāsu dṛśyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1089: coditāny anutiṣṭho vihitaṃ karmākurvato ninditāni ca kurvataḥ sarvāṇi sukhāni duḥkhāni ca paramapuruṣānugrahanigrahābhyām eva bhavanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1090: eṣa hy evānandayati atho so 'bhayaṃ gato bhavati atha tasya bhayaṃ bhavati bhīṣāsmād vātaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1091: bhīṣodeti sūryo bhīṣāsmād agniś candraś ca mṛtyur dhāvati pañcamaḥ iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1092: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi dadato manuṣyāḥ praśaṃsanti yajamānaṃ devā darvīṃ pitaro 'nvāyattā ityādyanekavidhāḥ śrutayaḥ santi /
GSP33ramvaspu:1093: yathoktaṃ dramiḍabhāṣye tasyājñayā dhāvati vāyur nadyaḥ sravanti tena ca kṛtasīmāno jalāśayāḥ samadā iva meṣavirsapitaṃ kurvantīti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1094: tatsaṃkalpanibandhanā hīme loke na cyavante na sphuṭante /
GSP33ramvaspu:1095: svaśāsanānuvartināṃ jñātvā kāruṇyāt sa bhagavān vardhayeta vidvān karmadakṣa iti ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1096: paramapuruṣayāthātmyajñānapūrvakatadupāsanādivihitakarmānuṣṭhāyinas tatprasādāt tatprāptiparyantāni sukhāny abhayaṃ ca yathādhikāraṃ bhavanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1097: tajjñānapūrvakaṃ tadupāsanādivihitaṃ karmākurvato ninditāni ca kurvatas tannigrahād eva tadaprāptipūrvakāparimitaduḥkhāni bhayaṃ ca bhavanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1098: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā niyataṃ kuru karma tvaṃ karma jyāyo hy akarmaṇaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1099: ityādinā kṛtsnaṃ karma jñānapūrvakam anuṣṭheyaṃ vidhāya mayi sarvāṇi karmāṇi saṃnyasya iti sarvasya karmaṇaḥ svārādhanatām ātmanāṃ svaniyāmyatāṃ ca pratipādya ye me matam idaṃ nityam anutiṣṭhanti mānavāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1101: ye tv etadabhyasūyanto nānutiṣṭhanti me matam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1103: iti svājñānuvartinaḥ praśasya viparītān vinindya punar api svājñānupālanam akurvatām āsur aprakṛtyantarbhāvam abhidhāyādhamā gatiś coktā tān ahaṃ dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu narādhamān kṣipāmy ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣv eva yoniṣu //
GSP33ramvaspu:1104: āsurīṃ yonim āpannā mūḍhā janmani janmani /
GSP33ramvaspu:1105: mām aprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yānty adhamāṃ gatim // iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1108: iti ca svājñānuvartināṃ śāśvataṃ padaṃ coktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1109: aśrutavedāntānāṃ karmaṇy aśraddhā mā bhūd iti devatādhikaraṇe 'tivādāḥ kṛtāḥ karmamātre yathā
GSP33ramvaspu:1110: śraddhā syād iti sarvam ekaśāstram iti vedavitsiddhāntaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1111: tasyaitasya parasya brahmaṇo nārāyaṇasyāparicchedyajñānānandāmalatvasvarūpavajjñānaśaktibalāiśvaryavīryatejaḥprabhṛtyanavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇavatsvasaṃkalpapravartyasvetarasamastacidacidvastujātavatsvābhimatasvānurūpaikarūpadivyarūpataducitaniratiśayakalyāṇavividhānaṃtabhūṣaṇasvaśaktisadṛśāparimitānantāścaryanānāvidhāyudhasvābhimatānurūpasvarūpaguṇavibhavāiśvaryaśīlādyanavadhikamahimamahisīsvānurūpakalyāṇajñānakriyādyaparimeyaguṇānantaparijanaparicchedasvocitanikhilabhogyabhogopakaraṇādyanantamahāvibhavāvāṅmanasagocarasvarūpasvabhāvadivyasthānādinityatāniravadyatāgocarāś ca sahasraśaḥ śrutayaḥ santi /
GSP33ramvaspu:1112: vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:1114: tasya yathā kapyāsaṃ puṇḍarīkam evam akṣiṇī /
GSP33ramvaspu:1116: puruṣo manomayo 'mṛto hiraṇmayaḥ manomaya iti manasaiva viśuddhena gṛhyata
GSP33ramvaspu:1117: ityarthaḥ sarve nimeṣā jajñire vidyutaḥ puruṣād adhi vidyudvarṇāt puruṣād ityarthaḥ nīlatoyadamadhyasthā vidyullekheva bhāsvarā madhyasthanīlatoyadā vidyullekheva seyaṃ daharapuṇḍarīkamadhyasthākāśavartinī vahnirśikhā svāntarnihitanīlatoyadābhaparamātmasvarūpā avāntarnihitanīlatoyadā visyud ivābhātītyarthaḥ manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīro bhārūpaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1119: ākāśātmā sarvakāmā sarvakāmaḥ sarvagandhaḥ sarvarasaḥ sarvam idam abhyātto 'vākyānādaraḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1122: hrīś ca te lakṣmīś ca patnyau /tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1124: yad ekam avyaktam anantarūpaṃ viśvaṃ purāṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:1125: yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyoman /
GSP33ramvaspu:1127: tad eva tad u bhavyamā idaṃ tadakṣare parame vyoman nityādiśrutiśataniścito 'yam arthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1128: tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam iti viṣṇoḥ parasya brahmaṇaḥ paraṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūraya iti vacanāt sarvakāladarśanavantaḥ paripūrṇajñānāḥ kecana santīti vijñāyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1129: ye sūrayas te sadā paśyantīti vacanavyaktiḥ, ye sadā paśyanti te sūraya iti vā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1134: yathoktaṃ tadguṇās te vidhīyerann avibhāgād vidhānārthe na ced anyena śiṣṭā iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1136: cāprāptatvena sarvaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ karma vidhīyate tathātrāpi sūribhiḥ sadā dṛśyatvena viṣṇoḥ paramasthānam aprāptaṃ pratipādayatīti na kaścid virodhaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1137: karaṇamantrāḥ kriyamāṇānuvādinaḥ stotraśastrarūpā japādiṣu viniyuktāś ca prakaraṇapathitāś cāprakaraṇapathitāś ca svārthaṃ sarvaṃ yathāvasthitam evāprāptam aviruddhaṃ brāhmaṇavad bodhayantīti hi vaidikāḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1140: niyuktārthaprakāśanāṃ ca devatādiṣv aprāptāviruddhaguṇaviśeṣaprtipādanaṃ viniyogānuguṇam eva
GSP33ramvaspu:1146: kiṃ punaḥ siddhavastuny eva tātparye vyutpattisiddha iti sarvam upapannam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1147: nanu cātra tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam iti parasvarūpam eva paramapadaśabdenābhidhīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1148: samastaheyarahitaṃ viṣṇvākhyaṃ paraṃ padam ityādiṣv avyatirekadarśanāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:1150: kṣayantam asya rajataḥ parāke, tadakṣare parame vyoman, yo asyādhyākṣaḥ parame vyoman, yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyoman
GSP33ramvaspu:1152: tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam iti vyatirekanirdeśāc ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1153: viṣṇvākhyaṃ paramaṃ padam iti viśeṣaṇād anyad api paramaṃ padaṃ vidyata iti ca tenaiva jñāyate
GSP33ramvaspu:1154: tad idaṃ parasthānaṃ sūribhiḥ sadādṛśyatvena pratipādyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1157: tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūraya iti parasthānam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1163: trīṇy apy etāni paramaprāptatvena paramapadaśabdena pratipādyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:1168: ta ime satyāḥ kāmā anṛtāpidhānā iti bhagavato guṇagaṇasya tirodhāyakatvenānṛtaśabdena svakarmaṇaḥ pratipādanam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1169: anṛtarūpatirodhānaṃ kṣetrajñakarmeti katham avagamyata iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:1171: yathā kṣetrajñaśaktiḥ sā veṣṭitā nṛpa sarvagā //
GSP33ramvaspu:1175: kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parāka iti rajataḥśabdena triguṇātmikā prakṛtir ucyate kevalasya rajaso 'navasthānāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:1176: imāṃ triguṇātmikāṃ prakṛtim atikramya sthite sthāne kṣayantam vasantam ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1177: anena triguṇātmakāt kṣetrajñasya bhogyabhūtād vastunaḥ parastād viṣṇor vāsasthānam iti gamyate
GSP33ramvaspu:1178: vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastād ityatrāpi tamaḥśabdena saiva prakṛtir ucyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1180: rajasaḥ parāke kṣayantam ityanenaikavākyatvāt tamasaḥ parastād vasantaṃ mahāntam ādityavarṇaṃ puruṣam ahaṃ vedety ayam artho 'vagamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1182: yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyoman /
GSP33ramvaspu:1183: tadakṣare parame vyomann iti tatsthānam avikārarūpaṃ paramavyomaśabdābhidheyam iti ca gamyate
GSP33ramvaspu:1184: akṣare parame vyoman nityasya sthānasyākṣaratvaśravaṇāt kṣararūpādityamaṇḍalādayo na paramavyomaśabdābhidheyāḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1185: yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ, yatra rṣayaḥ prathamajā ye purāṇā ityādiṣu ca ta eva
GSP33ramvaspu:1187: tadviprāso vipanyavo jāgṛvāṃsaḥ samindhate viṣṇor yatparaṃ padam ityatrāpi viprāso medhāvinaḥ, vipanyavaḥ stutiśīlāḥ,
GSP33ramvaspu:1188: jāgṛvāṃsaḥ askhalitajñānās ta evāskhalitajñānās tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā stuvantaḥ samindhata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1189: eteṣāṃ parijanasthānādīnāṃ sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ityatra jñānabalāiśvaryādikalyāṇaguṇagaṇavatparabrahmasvarūpāntarbhūtatvāt sad evaikam evādvitīyam iti brahmāntarbhāvo 'vagamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1190: eṣām api kalyāṇaguṇaikadeśatvād eva sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ity atredam iti śabdasya karmavaśyabhoktṛvargamiśratadbhogyabhūtaprapañcaviṣayatvāc ca sadā paśyanti sūraya iti sadādarśitvena ca teṣāṃ karmavaśyānantarbhāvāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:1191: apahatapāpmetyādy apipāsa ityantena salīlopakaraṇabhūtatriguṇaprakṛtiprākṛtatatsaṃsṛṣṭapuruṣagataṃ heyasvabhāvaṃ sarvaṃ pratiṣidhya satyakāma ityanena svabhogyabhogopakaraṇajātasya sarvasya satyatā pratipāditā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1194: tena pareṇa brahmaṇā svabhogyatadupakaraṇādayaḥ svābhimatā ye kāmyante te satyāḥ nityā ityarthaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1195: anyasya līlopakaraṇasyāpi vastunaḥ pramāṇasaṃbandhayogyatve saty api vikārāspadatvenāsthiratvād tadviparītaṃ sthiratvam eṣāṃ satyapadenocyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1196: satyasaṃkalpa ityeteṣu bhogyatadupakaraṇādiṣu nityeṣu niratiśayeṣv ananteṣu satsvapyapūrvāṇām aparimitānām arthānām api saṃkalpamātreṇa siddhiṃ vadati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1197: eṣāṃ ca bhogopakaraṇānāṃ līlopakaraṇānāṃ cetanānām acetanānāṃ sthirāṇām asthirāṇām ca tatsaṃkalpāyattasvarūpasthitipravṛttibhedādi sarvaṃ vāti satyasaṃkalpa iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1198: itihāsapurāṇayor vedopabṛṃhaṇayoś cāyam artha ucyate tau te medhāvinau dṛṣṭvā vedeṣu pariniṣṭhitau
GSP33ramvaspu:1200: iti vedopabṛṃhaṇatayā prārabdhe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vyaktam eṣa mahāyogī paramātmā sanātanaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1207: śrīmadvaiṣṇavapurāṇe samastāḥ śaktayaś caitā nṛpa yatra pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1213: viṣṇor dehānurūpāṃ vai karoty eṣātmanas tanum //
GSP33ramvaspu:1214: ekāntinaḥ sadā brahmadhyāyino yogino hi ye /
GSP33ramvaspu:1215: teṣāṃ tatparaṃ sthānaṃ yad vai paśyanti sūrayaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:1216: kalāmuhūrtādimayaś ca kālo na yadvibhūteḥ pariṇāmahetuḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:1217: mahābhārate ca divyaṃ sthānam ajaraṃ cāprameyaṃ durvijñeya, cāgamair gamyamādyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1218: gaccha prabho rakṣa cāsmān prapannān kalpe kalpe jāyamānaḥ svamūrtyā //
GSP33ramvaspu:1219: kālaḥ sa pacate tatra na kālas tatra vai prabhuḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1221: parasya brahmaṇo rūpavattvaṃ sūtrakāraś ca vadati antas taddharmopadeśād iti
GSP33ramvaspu:1222: yo 'sāv ādityamaṇḍalāntarvartī taptakārtasvaragirivaraprabhaḥ sahasrāṃśuśatasahasrakiraṇo gambhīrāmbhaḥsamudbhūtasumṛṣṭanālavikaravikasitapuṇḍarīkadalāmalāyatekṣaṇaḥ subhrūlalāṭaḥ sunāsaḥ susmitādharavidrumaḥ surucirakomalagaṇḍaḥ kambugrīvaḥ samunnatāṃsavilambicārurūpadivyakarṇakisalayaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1230: sa ca nikhilajagadudayavibhavalayalīlo nirastasamastaheyaḥ samastakalyāṇaguṇagaṇanidhiḥ svetarasamastavastuvilakṣaṇaḥ paramātmā paraṃ brahma nārāyaṇa ity avagamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1231: taddharmopadeśāt sa eṣa sarveṣāṃ lokānām īṣṭe sarveṣāṃ kāmānām sa eṣa sarvebhyaḥ pāpabhya udita ityādidarśanāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:1232: tasyaite guṇāḥ sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśānaḥ apahatapāpmā vijara ityādi satyasaṃkalpa ityantam viśvataḥ paramaṃ nityaṃ viśvaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim /
GSP33ramvaspu:1234: vākyakāraiś caitatsarvaṃ suspaṣṭam āha hiraṇyamayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyata iti prājñaḥ sarvāntaraḥ syāl lokakāmeśopadeśāt tathodayāt pāpmanām ityādinā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1235: tasya ca rūpasyānityatādi vākyakāreṇaiva pratiṣiddham syāt tadrūpaṃ kṛtakam anugrahārthaṃ taccetanānām aiśvaryād ity upāsitur anugrahārthaḥ paramapuruṣasya rūpasaṃgraha iti pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvā, rūpaṃ vātīndriyam antaḥkaraṇapratyakṣaṃ tannirdeśād iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1236: yathā jñānādayaḥ parasya brahmaṇaḥ svarūpatayā nirdeśāt svarūpabhūtaguṇās tathedam api rūpaṃ śrutyā svarūpatayā nirdeśāt svarūpabhūtam ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1237: bhāṣyakāreṇaitad vyākhyātam añjasaiva viśvasṛjo rūpaṃ tat tu na cakṣuṣā grāhyaṃ manasā tv akaluṣeṇa sādhanāntaravatā gṛhyate, na cakṣuṣā gṛhyate nāpi vācā manasā tu viśuddheneti śruteḥ, na hy rūpāyā devatāyā rūpam upadiśyate,
GSP33ramvaspu:1238: yathābhūtavādi hi śāstram, mahārajanaṃ vāsaḥ vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam
GSP33ramvaspu:1239: ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastād iti prakaraṇāntaranirdeśāc ca sākṣiṇa ityādinā hiraṇyamaya iti rūpasāmānyāc candramukhavat, na mayaḍ atra
GSP33ramvaspu:1240: vikāram ādāya prayujyate, anārabhyatvād ātmana iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1241: yathā jñānādikalyāṇaguṇagaṇānantaryanirdeśād aparimitakalyāṇaguṇagaṇaviśiṣṭaṃ paraṃ brahmety avagamyata evam ādityavarṇaṃ puruṣam ityādinirdeśāt svābhimatasvānurūpakalyāṇatamarūpaḥ parabrahmabhūtaḥ puruṣottamo nārāyaṇa iti jñāyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1242: tathāsyeśanā jagato viṣṇupatnī hrīś ca te lakṣmīś ca patnyau sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ tamasaḥ parastāt kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parāka ityādinā patnīparijanasthānādīnāṃ nirdeśād eva tathaiva santīty avagamyate
GSP33ramvaspu:1243: / yathāha bhāṣyakāra yathābhūtavādi hi śāstram iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1244: etaduktaṃ bhavati yathā satyaṃ jñānaṃ anantaṃ brahmeti nirdeśāt paramātmasvarūpaṃ samastaheyapratyanīkānavadhikānantaikatānatayāparicchedyatayā ca sakaletaravilakṣaṇaṃ tathā yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit parāsya śaktir vividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ca tam eva bhāntam anubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhātītyādinirdeśān niratiśayāsaṃkhyeyāś ca guṇāḥ sakaletaravilakṣaṇāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1245: tathādityavarṇam ityādinirdeśād rūpaparijanasthānādayaś ca sakaletaravilakṣaṇāḥ svāsādhāraṇā anirdeśyasvarūpasvabhāvā iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1246: vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ ced vidhyarthavādamantragataṃ sarvam apūrvam aviruddham arthajātaṃ yathāvasthitam eva bodhayanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1247: prāmāṇyaṃ ca vedānām autpattikas tu śabdasyārthena saṃbandha ityuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1248: yathāgnijalādīnām auṣṇyādiśaktiyogaḥ svābhāvikaḥ, yathā ca cakṣurādīnām indriyāṇāṃ buddhiviśeṣajanaśaktiḥ svābhāvikī tathā śabdasyāpi bodhanaśaktiḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1250: na ca hastaceṣṭādivat saṃketamūlaṃ śabdasya bodhakatvam iti vaktuṃ śakyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1252: yāni saṃketamūlāni tāni sarvāṇi sākṣād vā paraṃparayā vā jñāyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:1254: teṣu ca sākṣād vā paraṃparayā vā saṃketo jñāyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1258: dāhakatvādiśaktivad indriyāṇāṃ bodhakatvaśaktivac ca śabdasyāpi bodhakatvaśaktir āśrayaṇīyā
GSP33ramvaspu:1259: nanu cen indriyavac chabdasyāpi bodhakatvaṃ svābhāvikaṃ saṃbandhagrahaṇaṃ bodhakatvāya kim ity apekṣate, liṅgādivad iti ucyate yathā jñātasaṃbandhaniyamaṃ dhūmādyagnyādivijñānajanakaṃ tathā jñātasaṃbandhaniyamaḥ śabdo 'py arthaviśeṣabuddhijanakaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1260: evaṃ tarhi śabdo 'py arthaviśeṣasya liṅgam ity anumānaṃ syāt naivam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1261: śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandho bodhyabodhkabhāva eva dhūmādīnāṃ tu saṃbandhāntara iti tasya saṃbandhasya jñānadvāreṇa buddhijanakatvam iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1264: evaṃ bodhakānāṃ padasaṃghātānāṃ saṃsargaviśeṣabodhakatvena vākyaśabdābhidheyānām uccāraṇakramo yatra puruṣabuddhipūrvakas te pauruṣeyāḥ śabdā ity ucyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:1265: yatra tu taduccāraṇakramaḥ pūrvapūrvoccaraṇakramajanitasaṃskārapūrvakaḥ sarvadāpauruṣeyās te ca vedā ity+ucyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:1266: etad eva vedānām apauruṣeyatvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca yatpūrvoccāraṇakramajanitasaṃskāreṇa tam eva kramaviśeṣaṃ smṛtvā tenaiva krameṇoccāryamāṇatvam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1267: te cānupūrvīviśeṣeṇa saṃsthitā akṣararāśayo vedā ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvabhedabhinnā anantaśākhā vartante /
GSP33ramvaspu:1268: te ca vidhyarthavādamantrarūpā vedāḥ parabrahmabhūtanārāyaṇasvarūpaṃ tadārādhanaprakārādhitāt phalaviśeṣaṃ ca bodhayanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1270: vedānām anantatvād duravagāhatvāc ca paramapuruṣaniyuktāḥ paramarṣayaḥ kalpe kalpe nikhilajagadupakārārthaṃ vedārthaṃ smṛtvā vidhyarthavādamantramūlāni dharmaśāstrāṇītihāsapurāṇāni ca cakruḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1271: laukikāś ca śabdā vedarāśer uddhṛtyaiva tattadarthaviśeṣanāmatayā pūrvavat prayuktāḥ pāraṃparyeṇa prayujyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:1272: nanu ca vaidika eva sarve vācakāḥ śabdāś cec chandasyaivaṃ bhāṣāyām evam iti lakṣaṇabhedaḥ katham upapadyate
GSP33ramvaspu:1273: / ucyate teṣām eva śabdānāṃ tasyām evānupūrvyāṃ vartamānāṃ tathaiva prayogaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1274: anyatra prayujyamānānām anyatheti na kaścid doṣaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1279: sarvaṃ khalv idaṃ brahma aitadātmyam idaṃ sarvaṃ tat tvam asi śvetaketo enam eke vadanty agniṃ maruto 'nyo prajāpatim /
GSP33ramvaspu:1280: indram eke pare prāṇam apare brahma śāśvatam //
GSP33ramvaspu:1281: jyotīṃṣi śuklāni ca yāni loke trayo lokā lokapālās trayī ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1282: trayo 'gnayaś cāhutayaś ca pañca sarve deva devakīputra eva //
GSP33ramvaspu:1283: tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ vaṣaṭkāras tvam oṃkāraḥ paraṃtapaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1284: ṛtudhāmā vasuḥ pūrvo vasūnāṃ tvaṃ prajāpatiḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:1285: jagatsarvaṃ śarīraṃ te sthairyaṃ te vasudhātalam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1286: agniḥ kopaḥ prasādas te somaḥ śrīvatsalakṣaṇaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:1287: jyotīṃṣi viṣṇur bhuvanāni viṣṇur vanāni viṣṇur girayo diśaś ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1288: nadyaḥ samudrāś ca sa eva sarvaṃ yad asti yan nāsti ca vipravarya //
GSP33ramvaspu:1289: ityādisāmānādhikaraṇyaprayogeṣu sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ sarvaśarīratayā sarvaprakāraṃ brahmaivābhidhīyata iti coktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1290: satyasaṃkalapaṃ paraṃ brahma svayam eva bahuprakāraṃ syām iti saṃkalpyācitsamaṣṭirūpamahābhūtasūkṣmavastu bhoktṛvargasamūhaṃ ca svasmin pralīnaṃ svayam eva vibhajya tasmād bhūtasūkṣmād vāstuno mahābhūtāni sṛṣṭvā teṣu ca bhoktṛvargātmatayā praveśya taiścid adhiṣṭhitair mahābhūtair anyonyasaṃsṛṣṭaiḥ kṛtsnaṃ jagad vidhāya svayam api sarvasyātmatayā praviśya paramātmatvenāvasthitaṃ sarvaśarīraṃ bahuprakāram avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1291: yad idaṃ mahābhūtasūkṣmaṃ vastu tad eva prakṛtiśabdenābhidhīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1295: so 'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti tatsṛṣṭvā tad evānupraviśat tad anupraviśya sac ca tyac cābhavan niruktaṃ cāniruktaṃ ca nilayanaṃ cānilayanaṃ ca vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ ca satyaṃ cānṛtaṃ ca satyam abhavad iti pūrvoktaṃ sarvam anayaiva śrutyā vyaktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1300: sukhaṃ ca jñānaviśeṣasādhyaṃ padārthāntaram iti hi laukikāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1302: yena jñānaviśeṣeṇa tatsādhyam ity ucyate sa eva jñānaviśeṣaḥ sukham /
GSP33ramvaspu:1305: yena ca viṣayaviśeṣeṇa viśeṣitaṃ jñānaṃ sukhasya janakam ity abhimataṃ tadviṣayaṃ jñānam eva
GSP33ramvaspu:1308: evaṃvidhasukhasvarūpajñānasya viśeṣakatvaṃ brahmavyatiriktasya vastunaḥ sātiśayam asthiraṃ ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1312: tad idam āha raso vai saḥ rasaṃ he evāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavatīti brahmaiva sukham iti brahma labdhvā sukhī bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1313: paramapuruṣaḥ svenaiva svayam anavadhikātiśayasukhaḥ san parasyāpi sukhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1315: brahma yasya jñānaviṣayo bhavati sa sukhī bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1318: niravadyasyānantamahāvibhūter anavadhikātiśayasauśīlyasaundaryavātsalyajaladheḥ sarvaśeṣitvād ātmanaḥ śeṣatvāt pratibaṃdhitayānusaṃdhīyamānam anavadhikātiśayaprītiviṣayaṃ sat paraṃ brahmaivainam ātmānaṃ prāpayatīti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1321: tathā hi sarveṣām eva cetanānāṃ svātantryam eva iṣṭatamaṃ dṛśyate, pāratantryaṃ duḥkhataram
GSP33ramvaspu:1322: smṛtiś ca sarvaṃ paravaśam duḥkhaṃ sarvam ātmavaśaṃ sukham /
GSP33ramvaspu:1323: tathā hi sevā śvavṛttir ākhyātā tasmāt tāṃ parivarjayet /
GSP33ramvaspu:1326: / tathā hi śarīraṃ hi manuṣyatvādijātiguṇāśrayapiṇḍabhūtaṃ svatantraṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1336: ātmā jñānamayo 'mala iti smṛter jñānaikākāratā pratipannā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1337: patiṃ viśvasyetyādi śrutiguṇaiḥ paramātmaśeṣataikākāratā ca pratītā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1341: ata eva teṣām alpatvam asthiratvaṃ ca paramapuruṣasyaiva svata eva sukhatvam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1342: atas tad eva sthiram anavadhikātiśayaṃ ca kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma ānando brahma satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahmeti śruteḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1343: brahmavyatiriktasya kṛtsnasya vastunaḥ svarūpeṇa sukhatvābhāvaḥ karmakṛtatvena cāsthiratvaṃ bhagavatā parāśareṇoktam narakasvargasaṃjñe vai pāpapuṇye dvijottama /
GSP33ramvaspu:1344: vastv ekam eva duḥkhāya sukhāyerṣyāgamāya ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1345: kopāya ca yatas tasmād vastu vastvātmakaṃ kutaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:1348: evam anekapuruṣāpekṣayā kasyacit sukham eva kasyacid duḥkhaṃ bhavatītyavasthāṃ pratipādya, ekasminn api puruṣe na vyavasthitam ityāha
GSP33ramvaspu:1349: tad eva prīyate bhūtvā punarsuḥkhāya jāyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1350: tad eva kopāya yataḥ prasādāya ca jāyate //
GSP33ramvaspu:1351: tasmād duḥkhātmakaṃ nāsti na ca kiṃcit sukhātmakam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1352: iti sukhaduḥkhātmakatvaṃ sarvasya vastunaḥ karmakṛtaṃ na vastusvarūpakṛtam
GSP33ramvaspu:1354: yat tu sarvaṃ paravaśaṃ duḥkham ityuktaṃ tatparamapuruṣavyatiriktānāṃ parasparaśeṣaśeṣibhāvābhāvāt tadvyatiriktaṃ prati śeṣatā duḥkham evetyuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1355: sevā śvavṛttir ākhyātety atrāpy asevyasevā śvavṛttir evetyuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1356: sa hy āśramaiḥ sadopāsyaḥ samastair eka eva tv iti sarvair ātmayāthātmyavedibhiḥ sevyaḥ puruṣottama eka eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:1357: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā māṃ ca yo 'vyabhicāreṇa bhaktiyogena sevate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1359: itīyam eva bhaktirūpā sevā brahmavid āpnoti param tam evaṃ vidvān amṛta iha bhavati brahma veda brahmaiva bhavatītyādiṣu vedanaśabdenābhidhīyata ityuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1360: yam evaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhya iti viśeṣaṇād yam evaiṣa vṛṇuta iti bhavagatā varaṇīyatvaṃ pratīyate
GSP33ramvaspu:1362: yasya bhagavaty anavadhikātiśayā prītir jāyate sa eva bhagavataḥ priyatamaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1363: tad uktaṃ bhagavatā priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1365: tasmāt parabhaktirūpāpannam eva vedanaṃ tattvato bhagavatprāptisādhanam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1366: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā dvaipāyanena mokṣadharme sarvopaniṣadvyākhyānarūpam na saṃdṛśo tiṣṭhati rūpam asya na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaścanainam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1367: bhaktyā ca dhṛtyā ca samāhitātmā jñānasvarūpaṃ paripaśyatītīha //
GSP33ramvaspu:1368: dhṛtyā samāhitātmā bhaktyā puruṣottamaṃ paśyati sākṣātkaroti prāpnotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1370: bhaktiś ca jñānaviśeṣa eveti sarvam upapannam /
